story:
Read this page in:

한국어
中國語
日本語 
Español

FULLY FUNDED!!

Thanks to your support, WAYSKIN Home is reaching beyond our initial funding goal! As a thank you gift, we are including a FREE Seoul Cream in every package! Seoul Cream is a perfect moisturizer for city girls, backed by data science :)

As Featured On: 

"THE BEST BEAUTY IDEAS ON KICKSTARTER RIGHT NOW"

UV rays, fine dust and dry air batter your skin every day. The problem is that it’s nearly impossible to recognize these threats and guard against them. 

Chances are, you are too busy to visit the dermatologist on a regular basis. Or maybe you are just not willing to spend thousands of dollars for temporary improvements. Infrequent and inconsistent visits lead to ineffective skincare.

It’s difficult to navigate your way through a flood of information and find the right products. Even when you do, it’s still impossible to monitor and track how your skin is doing.

It’s difficult to navigate your way through a flood of information and find the right products. Even when you do, it’s still impossible to monitor and track how your skin is doing.

 

WAYSKIN Home packs your skincare needs into one phone-sized device that fits in your hand.

Whether you’re getting ready for the day’s conditions, checking your skin throughout the day, or getting personalized recommendations and LED care, WAYSKIN Home puts clinic-quality skincare into your hands.

 

1. Scan your skin with WAYSKIN Home’s sensor.

2. WAYSKIN app analyzes your skin and the environment around you to show personalized skin care tips and products.

3. Based on the recommendation, apply your favourite moisturizer/soothing cream.

4. Choose an LED Care program on WAYSKIN Home and start your skincare routine! Massage your skin with the LED pad. Start from cheeks and move on to smaller areas like forehead and nose. For neck and chin, move WAYSKIN Home in an upward motion toward your face for best results.

5. Just 3 minutes is all you need! WAYSKIN Home automatically turns off. Rescan your skin with WAYSKIN Home to see the difference!

 

  • Stimulates cells deep beneath your skin to produce collagen and elastin 
  • Fights early signs of ageing and relieves eczema, psoriasis, rosacea
  • Restores elasticity and bounce to your skin 

  • Eliminates the chances of unexpected breakouts without compromising moisture 
  • Kills acne-causing bacteria while keeping your skin hydrated 
  • Also improves the absorption of your skin so you can get the most out of your current routine

  • Gives your skin a consistent glow and overall tone-up 
  • Corrects UV damage and gently relieves other redness 
  • Boosts lymphatic flow leaving you with noticeably brighter, youthful and healthier skin

 

First discovered by NASA to have positive effects on cell growth, Light Emitting Diodes (LED) have been adopted by the healthcare and cosmetics industries for therapeutic and aesthetic effects. LEDs can emit different wavelengths that penetrate deep into the dermis (up to 850mm beneath the surface) and induce natural cellular reactions.

These reactions include, but are not limited to:

  • Build and strength cellular structure
  • Reduce atopic dermatitis
  • Stimulate mitochondria activity
  • Produce collagen and elastin
  • Boost oxygen
  • Reduce cytokines

To make LED Care work even better, WAYSKIN Home also sends out varying levels of microcurrent through the LED pad. Microcurrents stimulate your skin, help absorb moisture better, and lifts the muscles within. Combining the benefits of LED and microcurrents, WAYSKIN Home delivers professional-grade facial, all from your hands.

Studies:

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC39... 
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC41...
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/16989189
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21275531
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19764893
  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20662038
  • https://joovv.com/blogs/joovv-blog/116390659-6-...
  • https://www.stonybrook.edu/newsroom/general/140...

 

Beautiful skin deserves beautiful device. 

Skincare you can take anywhere. 

Skincare tips and recommendations just for you. 

  Fast Just 3 minutes is all you need.

 

PROTOTYPE

 

 

In 2015, we launched an Indiegogo campaign for the original WAYSKIN and nearly 700 of you pledged $127,742! This year we’ve taken your feedback and made WAYSKIN even better!

 

Available modes:

- Humidity Monitor 

- Skin Moisture Scanner 

- 3 LED Care Programs (Aqua Blue, Lemon Yellow, Rose Red) 

① Rose Red: 620~630nm 

② Lemon Yellow: 585~595nm 

③ Aqua Blue: 455~465nm

Time to Full Charge:

- 2 hours

Battery Life:

 - LED Care: 1.5 hours

Battery:

- Lithium-ion 700mAh 

- Charged with USB 2.0 (Type-B) Cable

Size:

- (W*D*H) : 1⅞’’ x 7⅛’’ x ’⅛” (45mm X 180mm X 30mm)

Weight: 

- 0.3lb (146g)

Colour:

- Front (Display): White 

- Back (Sensor): Grey & Silver

Connection: 

- Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE)

Compatibility iOS / Android: 

- Android 4.3 or later 

- iPhone 5 and up / iOS 9.0 or later

 

 

We at WayWearable are passionate about one thing - bringing awesome skincare to the masses. Founded in 2014 in Seoul's trendy Gangnam district, WAYSKIN is designed to meet the beauty and skincare demands of your busy lifestyle.

At WayWearable we have been exploring the intersection between data science and skincare to bring you truly personalized skincare experience in a smart device. 

Imagine if you can assess your skin condition and the environment around you to get specific recommendations. You would be able to make more informed decisions on product choices and skincare routine. What's more - it saves you time and money! We're not there yet, but with your help we'll be one big step closer.

Get your WAYSKIN Home today and join our journey to better skincare at home!

----

WayWearable’s CEO holds a major in economics from Yonsei University. Prior to founding WAY Wearable, he was a CEO of another healthcare startup, Design Your Body, for three years.

Our CTO has a background in hardware and software development as well as experience in IT consulting and Marketing in Hewlett-Packard.

Co-founder Dr. Gana Oh, is a professional dermatologist at ‘Choice Dermatological Hospital’ in Gangnam and has helped the team build additional expertise in this area.

Other members of the team include amazing designers with extensive experience in the cosmetics industry and have won a prestigious Red Dot Award.

 

 

30-day Satisfaction Guaranteed Return Policy

We're sure you'll love WAYSKIN Home. So sure, we are offering a 30-day satisfaction guarantee!

If you want to return WAYSKIN Home for any reason, please contact us at home@wayskin.com. We will be happy to help you with the refund.

*Note: Shipping charges, Kickstarter and credit card fees are not refundable.

Let Your Skin Festival Begin!

Your skincare is not just about the skin - it affects and reflects your mood, confidence, and well-being. With healthier and more glowing skin, you may start the day with a smile, try something new, and feel content about your skin throughout the day. And you will, because your skin is in good hands with WAYSKIN Home.

story:
RuK has over 15 features designed specifically for kicking ass at your job and in the gym. As athletes and professionals, we were determined to not only dominate our careers, but never lose the ability to prioritize physical health and fitness.  We designed ONE bag that could serve a fitness minded business professional in both the corporate and gym environment. Whether you commute for the day or are on a 2 day trip, RuK It Up! 

 

  • Separate areas for business and fitness because no one wants your sweat on their docs
  • Take your tech from the office to the gym and back without letting it die
  • Water resistant design keeps contents dry in wet conditions

 

  • 40+ liter capacity to travel light but have your essentials for a 1-2 day trip all-in-one bag
  • Race through the airport, RuK pack meets all standards set by TSA airport security

  • Isolated compartments for sweaty clothing and workout shoes 
  • Beverage bottle holder that doesn’t take up any bag space and tucks away when empty
  • Always have power stored to get a charge anytime, anywhere

Forget dragging two bags to work. With over 15 compartments and features to stow your fitness gear, tech, and prepped meals, your commute just got easier. 

 

Keep your workouts intense, tunes playing, and headphones fully charged with RuK’s solar-powered USB ports.

 

RuK’s sleek, professional design hides a compartment made just for isolating your fitness gear, letting you access your tech and show off your gains to the office, not your sweaty gym clothes.

 

If you’re elbowing for a wall outlet at your airport terminal, you aren’t doing travel right. Get power for your tech and space for your essentials in a convenient TSA-approved carry-on for 1 to 2 day travel.

Colors

RuK comes in two colors, black and gray. The black pack delivers in December 2019 and the gray delivers in January 2020. For shipping to Mexico and Canada, please note that backers are responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

 

Solar Specs

  • In direct sunlight, most smart phones can typically be charged at a rate of about 1% per 2 minutes. Larger devices, like tablets, may take longer.
  • In cloudy or overcast weather, charge speed can be unpredictable. 
  • The RuK Pack only works with USB devices and does not store power, so an external battery bank will need combined with the pack if you wish to charge a phone or accessory after dark, indoors, or in adverse sunlight conditions.
  • For best results, switch to airplane mode and close all applications running on your smartphone to ensure charging time becomes more efficient.


From athletics to accounting. From rugby to real world. When the founders of RuK entered the white-collar workforce, they were determined to not only dominate their careers, but never lose their ability to prioritize physical health and fitness. As athletes their entire lives, RuK’s Jon Clark and Todd Newman struggled to find ONE bag that could serve a fitness minded business professional in both the corporate and gym environment. 

Spending over 15 years climbing the professional ladder, both men continued to dominate their careers, ultimately running a variety of their own successful businesses.  But a void still remained.  Carrying a backpack to the conference room was a great conversation piece, but rarely considered “professional.” Bringing prepped meals to work meant carrying two bags.  Having a dedicated laptop satchel or briefcase meant making room for 3 bags. Travelling for a business trip? You might as well give up on your diet and training routine all together! Until now.  The RuK Pack was born to be an all-in-one solution to ensure you never have an excuse not to prioritize your physical fitness while you crush your career goals.


“Throughout our lives, we’ve been passionate about promoting health and fitness to our families, employees, and across the general workforce. The RuK Pack is a massive step in the right direction to give society one less excuse to give up on their new year’s resolutions. At RuK, we strive to make it simple for people to hit health and fitness goals, without sacrificing their dedication to killing it at their careers.”

-Jon Clark, Founder & CEO, RuK Enterprises

Not only will pledging to buy a RuK Pack help you dominate your day, but it will have direct impact on supporting an incredible cause. RuK is very proud to play a role in the development, support and innovation of some of the world’s most underprivileged societies.  In partnership with the Mbenga Foundation, RuK has committed to providing a percentage of proceeds for each RuK Pack sold towards the purchase of solar lighting in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). 

Pre-product launch, RuK will already have purchased over 1000 individual solar powered, motion sensor lights to be delivered to the DRC before Christmas of this year.  The RuK Founders have also been invited to participate in the 2020 Sultani Makutano Innovation Summit in Kinshasa, DRC; an event to further help the great people of the DRC Dominate their Day!

The RuK engineering team has worked tirelessly to provide consumers with the most innovative and powerful solar technology available for the RuK Pack.  We are confident you will not find another Solar bag on the market that can compete with RuK’s power to panel-size ratio. On our mission to create the most versatile backpack on the market, we discovered there were challenges finding an aesthetically pleasing solar panel—but we were ready to tackle them! Based on numerous design iterations, multiple user testing sessions, and consumer feedback, we feel like we nailed it! After all, no one wants to carry around a huge, heavy, ugly panel and sacrifice convenience and style.   

Below is some helpful information to ensure you have the best possible RuK experience when you purchase the most advanced and versatile solar backpack on the market.

  • RuK Pack’s solar panel is smaller than more powerful USB solar panels available; this is intentional as we did not want to jeopardize the integrity of the bag’s design
  • In direct sunlight, most smart phones can typically be charged at a rate of about 1% per 2 minutes. Larger devices, like tablets, may take longer
  • In cloudy or overcast weather, charge speed can be slow and unpredictable 
  • The RuK Pack only works with USB devices and does not store power, so an external battery bank will need combined with the pack if you wish to charge a phone or accessory after dark, indoors, or in adverse sunlight conditions
  • For best results, switch to airplane mode and close all applications running on your smartphone to ensure charging time becomes more efficient
  • Solar technology all depends on the sun and it can be unpredictable.  We do not recommend Solar powered USB charging products to be used as your primary method of powering devices  

 

 

Risks and Challenges

There are risks that may be out of our control. However, If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. We will keep each backer in the loop about the final shipping date.

story:
WHO WE ARE AND WHAT WE ARE DOING 

Health care costs are a big deal and they are out of control. More government control and regulation is not the answer. We have the answer and you can be the solution.                 Healthcare and Wealthcare for Life.

We have created an alternative to The Affordable Care Act or ObamaScare as we call it. Instead of of more government involvement and restrictions we offer more freedom, choice, and open access to treatments, providers and modalities. We believe that each individual has the unalienable rights to choose what they want, the kind of treatment and providers they want to use, not some organization, committee, government, or another person. Imagine being a part of this opportunity to help.

Now we want to share this with everyone that wants to save money, reduce costs, have more freedom, greater choices, and more options. We need your help to complete our dynamic website, and to spread the word to every freedom loving citizen of this great country. 

 

Hi I’m Tim Vest Founder of Active LifeSystems, a new innovative approach to healthcare.

I have worked in the healthcare, health insurance, and securities industry for over 38 years. I have personally created, and managed three very successful different self funded health plans for small businesses nationwide.

With a very experienced team of experts in medicine, healthcare, finance, insurance, marketing, ecommerce, alternative health modalities, diet, nutrition, and nutritional supplement formulation,  we have created an alternative health plan to health insurance and ObamaScare.

 

WHAT IT IS ALL ABOUT

Our Active Choice Health Plan is not health insurance, but a Non Profit charitable, educational and consumer co op. It is a member owned community to help each other provide health care and cover each other the way health insurance was meant to.

We cover all pre existing conditions, cover you world wide, allow you the freedom to choose the type of treatment, care, and providers you want,  traditional or holistic alternatives.

We believe that rather than having more government control and restrictions on what kind of treatments and providers you can go to or use, and how much care you can get.  Imagine how you would feel with more freedom and control, the freedom to choose who you want to go to and what kinds of treatment you want to receive, feel comfortable with and believe in.

We cover all modalities, traditional care and providers, as well as alternative holistic providers and treatments. How would you like the freedom and access to choose the type of provider you want to see including naturopaths, homeopaths, or an MD. You also have the freedom to choose the type of treatment you want including holistic alternatives. We give you the power to have the control, and responsibility over your health and well being. Not some government agency or appointed committee.

We believe that each individual has the right,  privilege, and freedom to choose what they feel is the best care, treatment, and provider for them.

We also encourage individuals to seek the best care anywhere in the US or the World. That is why we offer worldwide coverage. Wouldn't it feel great to be able to find and use the best modalities anywhere in the world when it comes to your health, mind, and body.

The reason our health plan is non profit charitable and educational cooperative is so that we can build a community that is focused on helping each other rather than trying to make as much money as possible and making sure our stockholders are getting the highest returns possible. We offer an education, consumer based plan that puts you in charge of your future health and happiness that gives you control over your life, your health care and allows you the freedom to choose where and how you spend your healthcare dollars. Because our program is Non Profit, if you don’t need your healthcare plan for a catastrophic event during the year  you will actually get money back tax free.

 

WHAT YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL DO 

The money we are raising is to help us complete a dynamic interactive website for members and providers to interact with a very extensive knowledge base to bring together the best health care information, options, treatments, modalities, and knowledge so that you can find what you need to keep you and your family healthy, happy, and strong.Can you imagine how great you would feel to be a part of this great community. We are also seeking out the best and greatest providers, practitioners, and healers from all over the world and creating links to them and you, so that you can choose who you want to go to and the treatment that you want to receive.

We are also seeking contributions for our national marketing campaign. We want to take our program to and reach as many people as possible. We want to share this with everyone that wants save money, reduce costs, have more freedom, greater choice, more opportunities, and to take responsibility for their health and wellbeing. How would you feel to know that  you were able to help bring this type of a program to everyone in the country. Everyone deserves freedom and choice. 

  

Over the past two years we have been proving and perfecting The Active Choice Health Plan to make sure that everyone can use our resources and save money on their health care costs and treatments.  We have been able to save as much as 50 to 70% off of medical expenses and care by teaching our members to be consumers and shop for services and by using holistic alternatives.

Just imagine what you could do with a 50% savings off of your current health insurance costs. It does not have to cost that much. With more freedom and greater choice also comes more responsibility, however with more responsibility comes greater savings and with greater savings comes more discretionary income for you to use for yourself or your family. The quickest and easiest way to give yourself a raise is by lowering your health care costs and expenses.

 

With your contributions we will be able to help educate, cover, and teach 1000’s if not millions of people how to be healthier, happier, be more prosperous and productive. We want to offer them  the freedom, choice, and power to control their own health and wellbeing. We want to help open people’s minds and provide them with the knowledge and power to make educated decisions on their health care and give them the control of their own health and finances. We want to help give them more options in health care that they have not had before. We want everyone to have freedom of choice, not have choice taken from them and dictated who they can see, what treatments they get, and how they want to be taken care of by a committee of  strangers telling them what they can or can’t do.

  

We want to help as many people as possible reach health and financial freedom. By joining our community you can help us reach thousands, tens of thousands or even millions of people that want to save money, be healthier, happier, be more prosperous, productive, and have more freedom, more choices, more options and control over their healthcare.

 

Please help, and contribute today, by helping each other we help keep our children, our selves and our country strong and healthy.

We are offering Healthcare and Wealthcare for Life.

If you can not contribute but would still like to help because you believe in what we are doing, then please share this with 5 or 6 of your friends, your face book friends, Linked In groups, Twitter, and all your contacts.  Thank you for your help and support.

 

PERKS:

All contributors will be listed as someone that is making a difference in healthcare and changing the future for everyone in the United States of America.

 

For a $5 contribution you will receive an honorable mention in our monthly newsletter, website and facebook page.

 

For a $20 contribution you will be listed as a SILVER Contributor on our permanent records and will have your name listed on our website and our facebook page.

 

Our marketing platform is an online ecommerce mall, called Stratus Mall.  We can offer any service or product through our online mall.  We are offering a unique opportunity to share in this experience and be able to purchase healthcare and healthcare products and nutritional supplements at discounted prices.

 

With your $50+ contribution you will be listed on our permanent record as a SILVER Contributor and have your name listed on our website and facebook page.

You will also receive a one year membership as a Preferred Customer on our online ecommerce site and receive instant rebates off our already low prices on everything you purchase.

 

With your $100+ contribution you will be listed on our permanent record as a GOLD Contributor and have your name listed on our website and facebook page.  

You will also receive a one year membership as a Preferred Customer on our online mall, and receive a commemorative certificate as a GOLD Contributor.

 

With your $250+ contribution you will receive everything as above, Plus a LIFETIME PREFERRED CUSTOMER MEMBERSHIP. This will allow you to take advantage of great savings and instant rebates on 1000’s of healthcare, nutritional products and supplements, and other health related products and services nationwide your entire life. You will also receive one of our, " IHELPED CHANGE THE WORLD" T-shirts.

 

With your $500+ contribution you will receive everything listed above, Plus have your name listed as a PLATINUM Contributor and a Founding Charter Member of our online Credit Union.

With your $1000+ contribution you will receive everything listed above plus a personal invite to the opening of our first surgical center and your name listed as a PLATINUM PLUS Contributor on a brass plague in the lobby. 

 If you can’t contribute for any reason, but still want to help us,  please forward this onto 5 or 6 of your friends and help us spread the word and opportunities to as many people as we can.

 

Thank you  and take care.

story:
My Story

I have grown up around race tracks and have always had a passion for cars and going fast. But it wasn't until I was 16 that I finally started racing karts. From that point on there was no turning back. 

I have been racing karts and cars now for a total of 7 years and have gotten the chance to drive some great machines. From 125cc shifter karts to 400 horsepower Mustangs I have a wide range of experience.

I am now trying to take my career down a new path, the path of vintage racing. My dad used to vintage race and now I want to fulfill my dream of racing at The Walter Mitty Challenge at Road Atlanta. This race is a landmark in the southeast for vintage racing and my Mustang fits into the vintage category now. 

This race will not only help me fulfill a dream but will also put me on a personal level with men and women that have the ability of furthering my career into the professional rankings of motorsports. 

I can't make this happen alone so I need partners to help me along. For contriubting you will receive a support package as a show of my appreciation. This could be anywhere from stickers to a shirt to your name on my race car!

This isn't just one race, this is a chance to take my career to the next level with help from you! 

Details of this campaign are below.

Thank You!

-Patrick Wilmot

 

Details

Goal: $2500

What that will be used for

  • Tires
  • Racing Fuel
  • Travel 
  • Entry Fee

Any money that exceeds my goal will be used toward my next racing project I plan to tackle!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to my campaign you can still help! Please take just a few minutes of your time to post this on your Facebook wall, Twitter, Instagram, or on LinkedIn. 

Anything will help!

What that will be used for

Tires
Racing Fuel
Travel 
Entry Fee



Any money that exceeds my goal will be used toward my next racing project I plan to tackle!
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't contribute to my campaign you can still help! Please take just a few minutes of your time to post this on your Facebook wall, Twitter, Instagram, or on LinkedIn. 
Anything will help!

story:
Short Summary: Gardens and Play areas are contaminated with toxic amounts of lead, but gardeners and children are unaware of this fact and still use these areas.  This project sets out to prevent children’s exposure to hazardous amounts of lead in their play areas.  My name is Howard W Mielke.  I live in New Orleans where I have been conducting studies on lead in the environment and children’s exposure for two decades.  I have an eclectic background that includes chemistry, biology and geography.  I received my PhD from the University of Michigan.  My career includes teaching at public universities (UCLA, University of Maryland Baltimore County) and private institutions (Macalester College, Xavier University of Louisiana College of Pharmacy) and currently I am a faculty member in the Department of Pharmacology, Tulane University School of Medicine.  My professional expertise is the study of poisons and especially the mapping of chemical environments of cities.

The lead safe play area campaign can be stated in four sentences.  During the Twentieth century cities became contaminated by millions of tons of lead used in consumer products, especially paint and gasoline additives .  Young children are distressingly sensitive to lead dust and exposure causes multiple health outcomes including intellectual deficits and behavioral problems.  Gardens are being established in lead contaminated areas and children are being exposed to lead dust when they eat contaminated vegetables or play. Because communities are unsafe for children they are unsafe for everyone.  Our goal is to create lead safe areas for gardening and playing within contaminated neighborhoods of the city. 

Brief description of campaign importance:  As concerned citizens, parents, educators, and grandparents this project is vitally important to me and my partners at NolaUnleaded.  As a result of studies in the 1970’s I became aware that cities were lead contaminated as the result of the daily accumulation of lead dust, especially from vehicle traffic because gasoline contained lead additives.  My daughter became lead poisoned and after thorough investigation I discovered that she was playing in soil that was recognized as hazardous waste if it were on industrial properties. When the soil was changed her blood lead rapidly declined.  In the 1980’s I worked with a group of concerned citizens and the Minnesota State Legislature to ban the use of lead in gasoline. The rapid phase-down was accomplished through action by Congress and the EPA on January 1, 1986, the residue of the lead dust in urban environments has not being dealt with.   Further investigation revealed patterns of lead poisoning of children that were related to city size and location of residences within cities.  Children depend on the adult population to provide for their well-being.  The goal of this project is to create lead safe gardens and play areas within lead contaminated communities of New Orleans.

What contributors will help achieve:  My team mapped the environmental lead in New Orleans and we have a good understanding of communities where the highest amounts of soil lead exist in the city.   The city and federal government are doing lead cleanup at public properties.  New Orleans city officials are taking measures to clean up parks.  The US Housing and Urban Development changes the environmental quality at public housing properties throughout the city of New Orleans.  The major gap is cleanup of private properties.  Contributions to this project go directly to reducing lead at gardens and play areas in New Orleans. The project works with garden programs to analyze vegetable garden soils and actively reduce soil lead. We also work with properties that are not being handled by public sector actions such as childcare centers and church properties.  Garden projects are springing up all over New Orleans. There are about 100 childcare centers that are located in high lead areas of the city.  To date we have changed the play environments at 25 childcare centers and 10 church property play areas. Changing the environment from lead hazardous to lead-safe gardens and play areas provides an essential condition for children’s well-being and assists with the prevention of the lifelong health problems that are associated with early exposure to lead.

What We Need:  The lead safe soil project needs a modern handheld X-ray fluorescence (XRF) analyzer for rapidly testing the lead content of soils. With the XRF we can more efficiently identify gardens and play areas to prevent lead exposure of children.  You will have the satisfaction of knowing that contributions are being used to test and promote the quality of gardens and play areas where large numbers of children play.  Your contribution also generates action toward a model project that can be duplicated by other cities in the U.S.  The lead problem will not be controlled until the lead residues in gardens and children’s environments are dealt with.

More detail:  The lead-safe project uses the soil lead map of New Orleans as a guide to select neighborhoods in the city that need attention.  The project obtains signed consent forms from property owners. Then the contractor comes in to measure the area, places a geotextile garden cloth on the surface of the contaminated soil, and brings in very low lead soil from outlying areas of the city.  Each project takes about 4 to 6 hours to accomplish.  Thus, within hours we change the soil from Pb contaminated with 500 to 1000 ppm to very clean less than 10 ppm. The clean soil provides a margin of safety to gardeners and children who use and play in the area.

As indicated by the lead map, there are numerous neighborhoods that need treatment.   The contributions will pay two people, Chris Gonzales and Eric Powell, who work together to locate childcare center and church properties and a local contractor, David Dapremont and crew, to haul low lead soil into high lead neighborhood properties and create lead-safe gardens and play areas within contaminated communities of New Orleans. We also have a CPA and Executive Director who assists with the project.  The project directs 100% of the contributed funds to support activities that test, treat and monitor the lead-safe garden and play area projects.  

Lead Lab, Inc: is a not for profit 501(C) (3) corporation registered in Louisiana and all contributions are tax deductable to the fullest extent of the law.  We welcome any contribution amount.  As perks, we send out Mardi Gras beads and a Lead Safe Play Coloring books.  Also, New Orleans is America's #1 Favorite City, and we seek to make it a lead safer place to garden and play in.

All funds will be used toward the stated goals, namely developing lead-safe gardens and play areas on private properties.

The Impact:  Children living in the inner city New Orleans exhibit many of the symptoms of lead poisoning:  They demonstrate serious educational failure, rampant behavioral problems, and display notoriously high rates of violence as young adults.  Education failure and violence are terribly expensive to the individuals, families and their communities.  Many costly chronic diseases are also associated with childhood lead exposure including, kidney and cardiovascular disease.   Reducing lead exposure by the youngest children should reduce the incidence of chronic diseases and improve community well-being in the future. 

The difference contributions will make:  This campaign will make it possible to continue with the on the ground improvements at play areas where large numbers of children play.  Without this service many children will continue to be exposed to their lead-contaminated play areas. 

Why the project is valuable to the world:  A successful play area lead prevention program in New Orleans would be a model program for other U.S. cities. For the U.S. to continue as a world leader it needs to promote primary lead prevention for the youngest generation of citizens. This project aims to promote environmental health for citizens by testing for contamination and appropriately changing the environment.

Lead Lab, Inc. has a successful track record with lead contaminated soil intervention: 

  • Several successful pilot projects have demonstrated the feasibility and cost effectiveness for changing the environment at residential, and specifically, childcare and play properties in New Orleans.  Now we seek to extend the project to additional communities in the city.
  • NolaUnleaded is a partner organization of mothers who had children that were lead poisoned.  Nola Unleaded and Lead Lab, Inc. initiated a lead-safe project on 13 city parks which was carried out by the city in 2010-2013. 

The issues facing our children can be successfully resolved if adults work together to improve the quality of the environment. 

Some people just can’t contribute, but they can help:  So folks if you cannot contribute please help get the word out and make some noise about the lead safe play area campaign.    There are some excellent share tools available on Indiegogo!  Please pass this campaign on to your friends and neighbors.

story:
Hi,

My name is Aisha. I'm a wife and a stay-at-home mother of 2 boys. I'm from the Philippines but living in America with my family.

My campaign is for my sister-in-law, Minchu. She needs to raise at least $35,000 for her kidney transplant. This is my second time campaigning for her. The first one, I only raise $45 and I am thankful for the people who gave. Here's something about my sister-in-law:

Minchu, 29, is also a wife and mother of two adorable kids, ages 6 & 7.  Although young, Minchu is suffering from kidney failure.   She receives dialysis twice a week and is in need of a kidney transplant as soon as possible.Minchu wants more than anything to see her kids grow up and to take care of her family. Her kids need her and my brother needs her too.She is their rock. It would be devastating to see those kids grow up without their mom.

She has family members in the Philippines who are willing to donate a kidney, but the cost is simply enormous --especially for Filipinos who only earn several dollars per day. 

To raise funds in the Philippines is much more difficult compared to doing the same in America.

My husband and I don't make enough money to cover the cost of the procedure, but we give what we can.

It simply isn't enough to be able to provide significant help. We ask that you please help us to save Minchu's life by giving what you can. I promise you that your money will go only towards her medical expenses. Please help by sharing her story with everyone you know!

Thank you for taking the time to read this campaign for Minchu.

story:
DEADLINE EXTENDED TO THURSDAY, 1/5/12

My Story

Hello.  I am a 3 1/2 year survivor of breast cancer and a widow with a child still at home.  In 2008, I had to have a double masectomy and lymph nodes removed from both sides.  The next day, they had to do another lymph node dissection because they found cancer in the lymph nodes they removed.  No one had ever informed me about lymphedema risks and the fact that 35% of breast cancer patients get it to some degree. When the lymph nodes are removed due to breast cancer, fluid builds up in the affected area which for me is my arms, chest, ribs, underarms, and back.  I have severe lymphedema in my torso area and lighter lymphedema in my arms.  I have bought and tried many, many different compression garmets and devices but none work.  


I lived in a large city before moving back to rural Louisiana where I grew up.  In the large cities, there are doctors that can manually drain the fluid that accumulates.  In rural America, not so much, in fact, not at all.  My insurance company has finally preauthorized the purchase and certified the medical necessity of the lymph jacket and pump.  Unfortunately, I my co-pay is quite expensive.  


The medical supply company ordered the jacket and pump and dated the sale 12/30.  I do not have to actually give them the funds until Thursday when they deliver and customize it for me.  Keeping my fingers crossed...


The Impact

This lymph jacket will be used by me several times a week for the rest of my life.  It will keep the fluid from accumulating in my torso which limits my daily life as well as the things I can do with my child.  The pain that occurs from the fluid accumulation is so bad that it becomes so overwhelming.  Driving for any distance longer than an hour and flying in a plane both cause the lymphedema to get worse so my travel is limited.   Constant pain changes who you are - something I learned from my late husband through all of his illness and disability after the Vietnam War.  I do not want to live with pain any longer and this device is a simple, though expensive, way to eliminate this pain and this problem.  It will allow me to live a normal life, just hook up to this machine for 30 minutes a day and I'll be good as new.  You can read info on this medical device at the URL below.   

http://www.lymphcompression.com/docs/jacket.pdf


What We Need & What You Get

This will truly be the gift that keeps on giving.  It will be used for the rest of my life.  To cover my co-pay, I need $1,800 dollars  before 12/31/11.  On 1/1/12 my insurance deductible will go back up to $3,500 so buying this jacket before 12/31 is critical for me.  You can call the medical supply company directly that I am buying the jacket from at (337) 893-0181, contact name is Shauna, company is Patients Care Medical Supply in Abbeville, who can take you donation if you prefer.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please reach out to anyone who has been affected by breast cancer that could help. You can view my YouTube video at:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2tcA41xbOyY

story:
note: it is recommended to watch the above video fullscreen and in HD for the full experience.

 

Hi! My name is Nic Leggett, and with my mother Ann, I am starting +plus modern skin. Lots of people ask us "Why do you want to start a skin care company?" This is our answer.

10 years ago, Mom was diagnosed with breast cancer. We were freaked out and devastated, but Mom is the strongest person I know. She beat it. She often explains that one of the hardest parts of being diagnosed with cancer is this question: "Why did this happen to me?"

The scary part is that there's an answer: exposure to household chemicals can contribute to cancer. This isn't just that noxious oven cleaner, or that smelly bathroom cleanser. It's your body wash, your soap, your lotion, your moisturizer. Some people are exposed to over 200 different harmful chemicals every day. That's terrifying.

So Mom threw literally every single product she owned in the garbage, and began the 10-year odyssey to find a better solution. She's tried nearly every product on the market - and couldn't find anything that worked.

The problem is this: conventional skin care products are somewhat effective, easy to buy and usually feel and smell pretty good. But they contain noxious and toxic chemicals. Natural skin care products are free of chemicals (well, sometimes - read your labels!), but they are often only obtainable at specialty health food stores, or they don't contain effective concentrations of the ingredients. And let's face it, they smell weird and feel weird. 

So that's what we set out to do. We want to create beautiful products that are pure, powerful, free of chemicals and look really great on your bathroom counter.

Beautiful, not toxic.

Natural, not boring.

Pure, powerful, +plus.

 

We're starting our company with three flagship products:

+1.0 FACE MOISTURE

A flexible day+night moisture emulsion packed with powerful natural extracts and oils. Emu oil, shea butter, and peptides even skin tone and erase lines and wrinkles naturally. Apple stem cell extracts cause your skin's stem cells to reproduce at a higher rate, literally turning back the time on your skin. 30mL / 1,0 oz. Retail price: $55. Indiegogo price: $44.

+2.0 BODY MOISTURE

An ultra-moisturizing whipped body creme perfect for everyday use. A soothing combination of emu oil, shea butter and aloe. 175mL / 6,0 oz. Retail price: $45. Indiegogo price: $36.

+3.0 LIP MOISTURE

A refreshing and moisturizing ultra-mint lip balm with hints of rosemary to keep your lips hydrated even in the most extreme conditions. A bigger 0,25oz. tube means you're getting more for your money, too. 7mL / 0,25oz. Retail price: $15. Indiegogo price: $12.


Each of our products contains Aspen Bark Extract as a natural preservative - nothing even remotely artificial will ever be used in our products.


These products have been formulated in close cooperation with Renaud Naturals, a leading natural skincare manufacturer here in Colorado. They've helped us so much - and they have over 15 years of experience creating perfect skin care solutions. They are our manufacturer, too - so when you pre-order, you can trust that you're getting a very high-quality product.

 

Here's how it works:

  1. You order products from the options on the right, at discounted prices.
  2. We fulfill your orders as soon as possible after the Indiegogo campaign ends. (We will begin production after June 14, and we will fulfill orders in the order they were received.)
  3. We use the extra funds to sustain production and get on our feet.

Your contribution to +plus means the world to us. Here are some specific ways you'll be helping us by pre-ordering now:

  • Incorporation and legal paperwork
  • High-volume discounts on ingredients and packaging (which means our prices can stay low)
  • Create jobs for people in the community
  • Create a really efficient online store and keep it stocked
  • Research and formulate the next product lines
Even more importantly, you'll be spreading the word that there is a beautiful and natural alternative to toxic every-day products; and that's what makes us happy. 
 
The minute we receive our funds from Indiegogo, we'll spring into production; our manufacturer and suppliers are all raring to go!

 

There are a ton of ways to help +plus get off the ground:

PRE-ORDER

Pre-ordering our fantastic products (over there on the right-hand side >) helps us get +plus to you as quickly as possible; the more we raise, the more we can produce!

SPECIAL OFFER: The first 200 pre-orders on Indiegogo will receive a free sample of our body bar from our upcoming cleansing line!

*Please note: additional shipping charges per item are listed on each Perk. Please remember to add these charges to your contribution. If you live in the Denver / Boulder area of Colorado, we can also arrange a pick-up or local delivery for free.

SPREAD THE WORD

Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out; and it could mean free stuff for you! Create an Indiegogo account and use the Share tools below the video above to spread the word on Facebook, Twitter and other social media. We can see who shares it the most (as long as you're logged in to Indiegogo), and at the end of our campaign we'll reward the most vocal supporter with free product!

They've helped us so much - and they have over 15 years of experience creating perfect skin care solutions. They are our manufacturer, too - so when you pre-order, you can trust that you're getting a very high-quality product.


 

Here's how it works:

You order products from the options on the right, at discounted prices.
We fulfill your orders as soon as possible after the Indiegogo campaign ends. (We will begin production after June 14, and we will fulfill orders in the order they were received.)

We use the extra funds to sustain production and get on our feet.

Your contribution to +plus means the world to us. Here are some specific ways you'll be helping us by pre-ordering now:

Incorporation and legal paperwork
High-volume discounts on ingredients and packaging (which means our prices can stay low)
Create jobs for people in the community
Create a really efficient online store and keep it stocked
Research and formulate the next product lines


Even more importantly, you'll be spreading the word that there is a beautiful and natural alternative to toxic every-day products; and that's what makes us happy. 
 
The minute we receive our funds from Indiegogo, we'll spring into production; our manufacturer and suppliers are all raring to go!


 

There are a ton of ways to help +plus get off the ground:
PRE-ORDER
Pre-ordering our fantastic products (over there on the right-hand side >) helps us get +plus to you as quickly as possible; the more we raise, the more we can produce!
SPECIAL OFFER: The first 200 pre-orders on Indiegogo will receive a free sample of our body bar from our upcoming cleansing line!
*Please note: additional shipping charges per item are listed on each Perk. Please remember to add these charges to your contribution. If you live in the Denver / Boulder area of Colorado, we can also arrange a pick-up or local delivery for free.
SPREAD THE WORD
Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help us out; and it could mean free stuff for you! Create an Indiegogo account and use the Share tools below the video above to spread the word on Facebook, Twitter and other social media. We can see who shares it the most (as long as you're logged in to Indiegogo), and at the end of our campaign we'll reward the most vocal supporter with free product!

story:
The Short

Tristian is 15 months old and has bone cancer.  He needs surgery to remove a tumor in his leg.  He needs help.  He needs you.

Tristian's Story

Fifteen month old Tristian James has always been a happy go lucky little boy.  Always smiling, grooving, laughing, and bubbling with personality.  Then he began to stop placing weight on his left leg.  Although he wasn't walking yet he was always busy and cruising around the house, a force to be reckoned with.  Then he started to drag his left leg when he crawled and cried out in pain when he was picked up.  A trip to the emergency room and it was thought that he had an infection and would require surgery to relieve the pressure and swelling in his leg.  The nightmare began.

A day later and a dozen more tests and the first diagnosis came in.  A malignant tumor was found in his left femur.  Nineteen agonizing days after pathology and second opinions it was confirmed that Tristian has an extremely rare form of bone cancer, Ewings Sarcoma, literally unheard of in kids his age.  Two-thirds of his left femur is affected by the tumor.  He was started on chemo immediately to try to stop this aggressive cancer from spreading.  So far luck is on his side.

Your Contribution

Surgery is inevitable to remove the tumor and sooner than expected.  The hope is to salvage his leg if at all possible.  The surgery could be anywhere from Vancouver to further away into the United States.  There are no specialists in Saskatchewan to handle this delicate operation and so far no one within Canada who has seen this type of cancer in such a young child.

Your contribution will help cover the costs of travel, extra medical expenses like prescriptions and parking, and finally to help ease the loss of one full income in the household.  Someone must always be up at the hospital with Tristian as he is too young to leave by himself and neither of his parents want him to be alone.  Any contribution big or small will make a huge difference in this little boy's life.

Any funds that are raised over and above what will help these short term goals will be placed in trust for Tristian for any other medical expenses that may arise.  Should this battle with cancer be beaten back quickly any remaining funds will be held in trust for a college education for Tristian.

Importance

Tristian, thankfully, doesn't even realize that he is battling a life threatening condition and continues to be a beacon of light and happiness for those that are suffering alongside him.  Please donate to support this little boy and keep a smile on his face.

Thank you on behalf of Tristian and all of his family and friends for any contribution you can give, even if it's as simple as raising awareness for this fundraiser or Ewings Sarcoma itself.  We would also like to request that everyone out there take a moment to hug someone they care about, you never know when it might be your last chance.

story:
OK… we’re starting from scratch here. My name is Matt and this is all about my goal for the nation to raise $1,000,000 together to donate to the fight against Breast Cancer, but in an amazing way that has never before been done. I want to give nearly 50 million people a chance to come face to face with myself to make any donation (from one cent to a milliongagillion dollars)!

I will be taking a nearly 50,000 mile road trip through the 50+ most populated cities in the United States, stopping at each to spend time attending major events (pro sports, concerts, etc.) and organizing creative fund raisers of my own, to try and meet my total trip collection of the $1,000,000.

To gain attention along the trip I will be traveling in a convoy of at least 3 vehicles (“The Cause Crew”). On these vehicles I will be selling advertisement space to help eliminate the expenses of the trip. The more ads I sell, the longer I can stay out on the road to collect more donations to help FIGHT Breast Cancer. Plus the more space I fill with pictures of faces and colorful ads, THE MORE AWESOME THESE CARS WILL LOOK!.

I almost forgot! Funding the trip through IndieGoGo will get you something of your own on one of the cars! This can be almost anything! A picture of you or just your name to show you supported, a picture of a friend or family member who unfortunately had to fight or is fighting Breast Cancer, or even just something random (we must all be appropriate here!).

As I mentioned earlier, we(… that’s you and I) are starting from scratch, $0. After all, I am a 20 year old college student who is not fortunate enough to have the resources to fund the trip individually, or else you might have already seen me in your city!

First, I need to get an independent website designed for the project to get the word out and to begin securing sponsorship ads for on the cars to fund the trip. And as for the cars, I need those also. Once I begin securing advertisements however, I will be able to begin acquiring the things I need such as more vehicles.

I am looking to raise, through the support of you and other IndieGoGo visitors, enough money to have that website designed and purchase the first car. After all, I need a place to put the things you get to display in return for your support and the first set of sponsorship ads.

All who support through IndieGoGo will also get a mention on our website and a picture emailed to them showing their picture, graphic, or text on the vehicle (once it is filled) and a special thank you from myself and on behalf of all of those who will benefit from OUR donation of $1,000,000.

Even if you can’t donate, tell others, because if they do, then it happened because of you… not me. Letting them know is as easy as using a share option provided by our awesome friend here at IndieGoGo. I know your probably on some social site creepin on your friends right now… just click and share! You could be the link in the chain that saves a life with our big donation.

This is all about collaboration, we must bring together everyone we can and raise as much as we can. We can’t leave women alone in this fight against Breast Cancer, it’s going to take the attention of everyone, and that’s what I’m trying to promote. Anyone can make a huge difference, and it could be you. Donate, spread the word, both, or anything you can do to take action. Now buckle up, and join us on the Trip 4 A Cure.

Thank you very much for taking the time to listen.

story:
Philip George is my youngest child. Philip has always been full of energy and life! He is totally into all kinds of music and has a lovely singing voice. He participates in the show choir at Prosper High School, is taking auto tech classes because he absolutely loves cars and wants to make a career working on and transforming cars into amazing machines!! Philip has many friends in Plano and Prosper, and thrives on friends, music, fun, and adventure! Philip also has a 21 year old sister, Tori, who shares his love for music and life in general! It is such a gift to hear them randomly singing harmony together. It is such a spontaneous joy!!

He hasnâ€™t had to go to the doctor for even so much as a cold for 2 years, except for viral pharyngitis and a cut hand. At the start of his junior year at Prosper High, he began getting sick. We were thinking it was just a virus or something mundane, but when he wasnâ€™t getting better, and had a couple bad nights in a row, he was taken to an emergency clinic to get checked out. His symptoms were nausea, vomiting, pain in his abdomen near the ribs, fatigue, dizziness, confusion, malaise. The docs first thought it could be a gall bladder attack so they did an ultrasound of the abdominal area. They didnâ€™t see anything on the gall bladder but saw spots on the liver. They then did a CT scan. That showed innumerable lesions and masses on and around the liver. Also the liver was markedly enlarged. This was rather alarming to say the least. That is when our world shifted.

The docs looked closer and submitted the scan results to an oncologist because they told me that it could be cancer by the way it looked. The oncologist ordered a liver biopsy. The biopsy came back malignant. They call it Neoplastic Adenocarcinoma. This type of cancer originates somewhere else and spreads to the liver, so they needed to do an endoscopy and colonoscopy to try to find the source tumor or tumors. They also did a PET/CT scan of the entire body. The result was that the origin tumor is in the sigmoid colon. Soâ€¦.now it is called stage IV colorectal cancer to the liver. All of these tests, etc. happened over the span of 1 week so needless to say itâ€™s been very exhausting and traumatic for Philip and the family.

The oncologist has consulted with cancer experts at M.D. Anderson, Baylor, and Texas Oncology and all of them are scratching their heads and are baffled to use the docâ€™s words. They have never encountered or heard of a 17 year old with this type of advanced colon cancer. It is uncharted territory. We think that Philip has his youth in his favor. The docs think that he will really be able to benefit from and tolerate the recommended chemotherapy very well. He will be undergoing chemo for 6 months, every 14 days. He will carry a medi-pump with him for 48 hours for his infusion, then go back to get un-hooked. He will go 1x each week for CBC blood counts and labs. He started his first round of chemo on September 20th. He has done very well and has not exhibited any strange side effects or reactions so far. Since his immune system is shot now, it may be inadvisable to return to school. I know this will devastate him because he really wants to feel as normal as possible as long as he can.

Philips last chemo session will be on March 14th, then we will be looking at and evaluating his overall health and the health of his liver. Docs think he will probably need a liver transplant. We hope it doesn't come to that so we are praying hard and asking everyone to pray for him as well.

WHAT YOU CAN DO, AND HOW BLESSED WE WOULD BE ... AT THIS POINT, ANY DONATION WILL BE EXTREMELY HELPFUL AS WE ARE FACED WITH AN EVER INCREASING PILE OF MEDICAL BILLS. NOT TO MENTION THE COST OF ONGOING CARE, FOOD, OTC MEDICATIONS, AND THE CARE OF THE REST OF MY FAMILY. HAVING BEEN UNEMPLOYED FOR SEVERAL MONTHS JUST PRIOR TO PHILIPS DIAGNOSIS, WE RAN THROUGH WHATEVER LITTLE WE HAD SET ASIDE. JUST BECAUSE PHILIP HAS THIS DREADFUL DEADLY DISEASE, DOESN'T MEAN CREDITORS AND COLLECTORS WILL STOP HOUNDING. THEY DON'T REALLY CARE. I JUST WANT TO BE ABLE TO FOCUS ON WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT AND THAT IS PHILIP'S HEALTH AND WELL BEING. RELIEF IN ANY AMOUNT WLL GO A LONG WAY IN PROVIDING SOME RELIEF FROM THE WORRY. THANK YOU AND GOD BLESS!

story:
My husband and I have been happily married for 5 years. After a year of trying to have a family, we discovered that there was a problem. When my husband was three years old he had undergo surgery, and because of that surgery, it made it difficult for us to have children. We discovered that if we wanted a family, we would need to go through IVF, (In-Vitro Fertalization). The reality of having a family came with a 12,000 price tag. After years of financial and emotional stress, we were blessed with two beautiful twin girls.

After they were born, we realized that everything that we thought was important, everything we thought we "needed", was no where near as important as being a parent. We are very proud parents, and you can see it in the way we love them. We dream of having another baby someday, despite the upward hill we face in getting there.


IVF is a costly procedure. And you have to have all of the money upfront before you even begin your cycle. A cycle of IVF includes daily blood testing, countless ultrasounds, hormones, countless pills and medication, procedures, and comes with a lot of emotional stress. The IVF cost is 7500.00 alone, and then it is close to 5000.00 for the medication.


We have spent the past 6 months going through all of our belongings, deciding what is important to us, and what isn't, and selling it. We have been working at it non stop, and are getting closer to our goal of the cost of the procedure. It should be a happy thing, knowing that we can almost afford to get started, but we can't because we know at the end of it, we have to think about the cost of the medication.


We are not the type of people who ask for help easily. It is hard for us to admit that we need help. But we do. It is an impossible thing to explain, not being able to have a baby. In some provinces it is covered, or partially covered, but here it is not. I have been fighting not just for me, but all of the couples that suffer from infertilty, to try and get funding from the government, but with no luck. I continue to fight.


To ask someone for 5000.00 is impossible. But maybe 5.00 here, or 10.00 there, would help us reach our goal. Even if you just take the time to share this, you would be helping us.

There is nothing in this world more important to us than being a parents. We love our daughters Ellie and Reilly, and we would love to give them a brother or sister someday.

story:
The HOHTAI Mask Allows Athletes to Perform at Their Best

We are proud to present the HOHTAI Mask, a revolutionary mask that allows athletes to perform at their very best while protecting them from the Coronavirus pandemic with patented Virus Shield® technology. The HOHTAI Mask is made with our unique HOHTAI fabric, a highly breathable fabric that is also gentle on the face. Wear the HOHTAI Mask in any situation, from intense exercise to daily life, without feeling the discomfort you may feel from conventional masks. Use the best of Japanese technology to make your life safer and more comfortable.

In Japanese, “HOHTAI” means bandage. The material and method used to make SIDO’s HOHTAI fabric are universally known throughout the world since doctors use similar materials. Bandages have already been developed to be breathable and light for close contact with the skin. These characteristics are the key to a naturally comfortable garment.

How We Maximize the Comfort Level

When we founded SIDO, our top priority was to make the best underwear for athletes. An Athlete’s biggest enemy is sweat - the culprit of chafing, sticking, and stinking! We developed the HOHTAI fabric, a revolutionary quick-drying fabric that overcomes bothersome sticking and promotes ventilation.

We have received more and more requests for breathable face masks by high-performance athletes. In the chaos of the global Coronavirus pandemic, the demand is evermore present. In response to requests from top athletes who use HOHTAI Pants, our top-selling product line, we have started developing HOHTAI Masks that prevent virus infection and allow people to breathe easier with our moisture-wicking technology.

 

  • With our HOHTAI Mask, there is less friction on the face due to the uneven mesh, unique to the bandage fabric. It achieves a comfortable fit that does not cling to the face. Less friction also allows for more airflow, preventing stuffiness.
  • HOHTAI fabric allows moisture from breathing to escape, promotes ventilation, and is quick-drying. The wearer stays comfortable with this breathable mask and will not become stuffy, even on hot summer days.
  • The cotton, polyester, and polyurethane woven into the bandage fabric prevent unnecessary adhesion to the skin and is the best material on hot summer days, for sports, and physical activity.

 

 

How Virus Shield® Protects You

Conventional bandages are highly breathable, but cannot block the invasion of viruses. When developing the HOHTAI Mask we partnered with a major material manufacturer to use their Virus Shield® technology. The technology reduces virus transmission by 99% on the outer surface. By using our material on the inside, the HOHTAI Masks maintain an optimal comfort level for active users.

 

    Japan Quality

    We specifically developed and patented the unique “HOHTAI” fabric by improving medical bandages and created a revolutionary cotton material that is breathable and light.

    We have changed our pattern more than 30 times, testing and revising each pattern along the way. Now, we have finally developed the ideal shape.

    Also, the HOHTAI Mask’s special stitches and design wick away the sweat that would be absorbed by other traditional face masks and promotes a dry surface for your face at all times.

    Everything from cutting to sewing is handmade by highly experienced Japanese professionals. We are pleased to present the HOHTAI Mask, a revolutionary mask that combines 2 Made-in-Japan technologies; SIDO’s HOHTAI fabric and Virus Shield®.

     

    Supporting Athletes

    It is proven that a lack of oxygen may reduce IQ and fitness levels while increasing anxiety. However, in the chaos of the Coronavirus pandemic, a mask has become essential. Our priority is to provide athletes and daily users with a mask that supports peak performance and comfort.

    Not only athletes, but we support people in many different industries who love to perform at their best even in this chaotic era.

     

    What We Offer

     

    Perks

     

    SOCIAL MEDIA 

    Can’t support us financially? That’s okay! We would love to hear your support on social media.
    Follow us on Facebook.
