Bandages have already been developed to be breathable and light for close contact with the skin. These characteristics are the key to a naturally comfortable garment.

How We Maximize the Comfort Level
When we founded SIDO, our top priority was to make the best underwear for athletes. An Athlete’s biggest enemy is sweat - the culprit of chafing, sticking, and stinking! We developed the HOHTAI fabric, a revolutionary quick-drying fabric that overcomes bothersome sticking and promotes ventilation.
We have received more and more requests for breathable face masks by high-performance athletes. In the chaos of the global Coronavirus pandemic, the demand is evermore present. In response to requests from top athletes who use HOHTAI Pants, our top-selling product line, we have started developing HOHTAI Masks that prevent virus infection and allow people to breathe easier with our moisture-wicking technology.
 


With our HOHTAI Mask, there is less friction on the face due to the uneven mesh, unique to the bandage fabric. It achieves a comfortable fit that does not cling to the face. Less friction also allows for more airflow, preventing stuffiness.



HOHTAI fabric allows moisture from breathing to escape, promotes ventilation, and is quick-drying. The wearer stays comfortable with this breathable mask and will not become stuffy, even on hot summer days.

The cotton, polyester, and polyurethane woven into the bandage fabric prevent unnecessary adhesion to the skin and is the best material on hot summer days, for sports, and physical activity.

  How Virus Shield® Protects YouConventional bandages are highly breathable, but cannot block the invasion of viruses. When developing the HOHTAI Mask we partnered with a major material manufacturer to use their Virus Shield® technology. The technology reduces virus transmission by 99% on the outer surface. By using our material on the inside, the HOHTAI Masks maintain an optimal comfort level for active users. Japan QualityWe specifically developed and patented the unique “HOHTAI” fabric by improving medical bandages and created a revolutionary cotton material that is breathable and light.We have changed our pattern more than 30 times, testing and revising each pattern along the way. Now, we have finally developed the ideal shape.Also, the HOHTAI Mask’s special stitches and design wick away the sweat that would be absorbed by other traditional face masks and promotes a dry surface for your face at all times.Everything from cutting to sewing is handmade by highly experienced Japanese professionals. We are pleased to present the HOHTAI Mask, a revolutionary mask that combines 2 Made-in-Japan technologies; SIDO’s HOHTAI fabric and Virus Shield®. Supporting AthletesIt is proven that a lack of oxygen may reduce IQ and fitness levels while increasing anxiety. However, in the chaos of the Coronavirus pandemic, a mask has become essential. Our priority is to provide athletes and daily users with a mask that supports peak performance and comfort.Not only athletes, but we support people in many different industries who love to perform at their best even in this chaotic era. What We Offer Perks SOCIAL MEDIA Can’t support us financially? That’s okay! We would love to hear your support on social media.Follow us on Facebook.

story:
It’s no secret that sleep is vital to our health and quality of life. MajesticBeds™ is one of the only bedding companies to originate from a health care company. After years of component and design research, our mattresses have evolved, using up to 3 patented technologies and our proprietary foam to make the highest level of healthy, restorative sleep available to everyone.

Since February 2019 when we began to introduce our new line of MajesticBed mattresses and mattress toppers, we have received numerous testimonials demonstrating the power of MajesticBeds to deliver more restful, restorative sleep that truly can make a difference in people’s lives.

⇒ Take a look at MajesticBeds testimonials!

One of our latest products is the Majestic Embrace children’s bed. Backers of our Indiegogo campaign will help us make and distribute this new pressure-relieving mattress and our Fusion mattress topper to critically ill Make-A-Wish Michigan children who have wished for a room remodel.

Funding will also support a research studies via our Majestic Legacy Program*. These studies will validate the impact of the new Majestic Embrace mattress and Fusion mattress topper on reducing pain sensitivity and enhancing thee well-being of children with physical impairments and other serious health issues, resulting in individual case studies we can release to medical professionals. As we document and build awareness of the benefits of MajesticBeds pediatric products, our hope is that many more children will be able to experience a more restful, restorative night’s sleep.

Bonus: Backers at $79 and up will get to experience the American-made MajesticBeds difference for themselves and try one of our four new products: Our Majestic Adjustable Pillow, Fusion Mattress Topper, MajesticBed,  and Ergo Comfort Mattress.

The information provided on this Indiegogo campaign is intended to provide information about certain products to help create a better sleep environment.  It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment procedures and/or medical devices for specific medical conditions.

The ergonomic retail pillow, toppers and mattresses described herein are designed to provide superior support and comfort to relieve spinal, muscular and joint stress to achieve a more restful, restorative night’s sleep especially for people suffering from the pain associated with a range of symptoms.

It does not provide information to diagnose or treat a health problem or disease without consulting with a qualified healthcare provider.  A healthcare provider should always be contacted with any questions or concerns regarding a medical condition.

*Our Majestic Legacy Program is a program designed to help Disabled Veterans, Cancer/Chemotherapy patients, and children with  a critical illness and/or physical deformity who fall under a certain financial bubble. With this program we are able to help provide a sleep solution designed for their specific needs free of cost to help to have a restorative nights sleep without the burden of the cost.​

 

Our Why

Starting in 2001, national and off-brand companies changed the composition of the comfort layers of their mattresses to break down faster so people would have to buy more beds during their lifetime. Bodily pain and discomfort created by this profit-driven business model is forcing the average consumer to purchase a new bed every six years. This is costly both financially and physically.

In 2012, the findings of medical studies by Henry Ford Hospital in Detroit reported poor sleep quality and the resulting fatigue led to increased pain sensitivity, further disrupting sleep. The negative impact on those with medical issues is especially significant. Adverse sleep conditions can increase pain sensitivity in people with back issues, sleep apnea, arthritis, fibromyalgia, obesity, hypertension, menopause and can affect healthy individuals as well.

But it doesn’t have to be this way.

The results speak for themselves: MajesticBeds™ have helped our clients obtain a better, more restorative night’s sleep, reducing their sensitivity to pain associated with the symptoms of back pain, fibromyalgia, arthritis, hypertension and more – and ultimately improving their quality of life. We have dedicated ourselves to continue this tradition into the future.

Today, MajesticBeds outlast and outperform any other premium mattress (regardless of brand and price point) and cost significantly less. Not only do MajesticBeds provide more support and pressure relief, every component is more durable than the competition. What does that mean to you? A scientifically designed sleep surface that provides the comfort you need for a more restful, restorative night’s sleep for at least 15 years. And it’s guaranteed.

We chose to launch our Indiegogo campaign in cooperation with Make-A-Wish Michigan to support children asking the foundation for a bedroom remodel. In these select cases, the child is too ill to travel or participate in an active experience. Our Indiegogo backers will fund the creation of MajesticBed mattresses and toppers specifically designed to meet each child’s individual needs, with the goal to transform their bedroom where the child must spend so much time into a place of soothing comfort and restful, restorative night's sleep.

This campaign will provide the funding for the research we need to show medical professionals the benefits of these products for critically ill and physically impaired children. With a full anticipated cost for medical researchers and products of $50,000,  spreading the word about MajesticBeds will help even more children through the healing power of sleep.

Our Goal

After researching successful Indiegogo campaigns, we set our minimum goal at a conservative $25,000 to have the best chance at reaching it and to start making a difference for Make-A-Wish children. Documenting the impact patent pending MajesticBed sleep system designs have on these critically ill or physically impaired children will help us expand awareness of our pediatric product line and help countless others of all ages experience the true value of a good night’s sleep.

It seems every mattress company has made claims its bedding is a solution for millions of people who are experiencing poor, uncomfortable sleep affecting their health, their body, productivity, personality and even their happiness. Unfortunately, many of them are long on promises – but fall very short on performance.

MajesticBeds are different. The medical applications of the patented technology used in our comfort layers help deliver healthy, restorative sleep, with roots in pioneering a sleep solution for cancer patients experiencing night sweats and joint pain associated with chemotherapy. Imagine how comfortable a retail mattress must be to help reduce the pain associated with serious medical conditions. That’s MajesticBeds!

Our unsurpassed levels of adaptive support and comfort with our patent pending designs have continued to evolve with three patented technologies. It is our sincere hope that this Indiegogo campaign will spread the word about our unique line of MajesticBed products, bringing better sleep and decreased pain to hundreds of thousands of people in need.

Our History

MajesticBeds: A fusion of form and function

  • ORIGINATED in 1994 with a mattress topper created by MajesticBeds founder W. Alan Martens to help relieve joint pain and night sweats often caused by chemotherapy. 
  • FOCUSED designs from early independent medical sleep studies examining the impact of sleep deprivation on a number of symptoms, with scientific research at the heart of our products.
  • DRIVEN to create a line of high-quality, ergonomically designed retail sleep products, competitively priced and made in the USA, to not only provide personalized, adaptive support and superior comfort, but also to relieve and reduce the physical stress and pain associated with a range of physical and medical conditions.
  • EVOLVED over time with three patented technologies as well as proprietary foams in our comfort layers, bringing unrivaled products to market.
  • RESULTED in the MajesticBed retail product line of ergonomic, patent pending symptom-specific beds, mattress toppers and pillows.

 

What We're Made Of

A series of third-party sleep studies have examined the adverse impact of sleep deprivation on various medical conditions. The findings of these studies? Compared to cheaper, lower density foam and traditional innerspring mattresses, sleeping on high-density memory foam surfaces improved sleep quality and duration, and it reduced the painful symptoms of medical conditions, including chronic lower back pain, arthritis, Alzheimer’s, sleep apnea, fibromyalgia, pregnancy and circulatory issues.

At MajesticBeds, we’ve taken our retail mattress designs to the next level, with four pressure-relieving layers that work together to bring you the very best night’s sleep.

The Layers

All MajesticBed™ mattresses utilize a layered system for the adaptive support and comfort needed to aid in mobility, stabilize the spine, and provide adaptive comfort with a cooling surface that does not restrict circulation. 

  • Patented technology in the Ergo Gel Layer absorbs excess body heat while its pressure-relieving gel design eases painful hip and shoulder counter pressure.
  • Proprietary Ergo Comfort Layer molds to your body contours to create proper spinal support while reacting immediately to changes in your sleeping position.
  • Patented technology in the Ergo Transition Layer enhances the comfort layer’s ability to envelop the shoulders and hips, while minimizing surface counter pressure to further relieve shoulder and hip pain.
  • Ergo Core heavy density base foam creates the firmness needed to provide proper spinal support through a stabilizing edge-to-edge sleep surface.

 

The Evolution Of Gel Therapy

Four decades of medical research culminated in the patented technology we use in the innovative Ergo Gel Layer found on all MajesticBeds sleep systems (excludes Ergo Comfort). Our Ergo Gel Layer’s unique pattern uses a non-toxic, soy-based gel that is incredibly durable and biodegradable.

This gel is poured into a soccer ball pattern of pliable polyurethane to provide the perfect balance of orthopedic spinal support and pressure reduction. The Ergo Gel Layer neutralizes pressure by conforming around the hips and shoulders to minimize pressure points, producing proper spinal alignment and ensuring unrestricted blood circulation in both back and side sleepers of all shapes and sizes.

Over time, MajesticBed mattress designs have evolved into a combination of comfort layers complementing the top Ergo Gel Layer to create a cooling sleep surface that relieves chronic shoulder and hip joint pain.

The result is deeper, healthier, more restorative sleep.

 

Our Products

A Fusion of Form and Function

Adjustable MajesticPillow with a premium upgrade Cooling Pillow Protector

FORM 

An adjustable, uniquely shaped pillow designed to provide proper support of the cervical curve of the neck, cradle the head and relieve pressure on sensitive shoulder joints for side sleepers. An incredibly comfortable and supportive pillow!

FUNCTION

For sleep apnea patients on a CPAP, the MajesticPillow properly supports the cervical curve, ensuring the airway is open and encouraging the patient to be more compliant and consistent in using their CPAP oxygen delivery system.

For whiplash, neck injuries or recovering from cervical surgery, the MajesticPillow comfortably stabilizes the neck, maintaining proper cervical alignment for both back and side sleepers to relieve and lower pain levels. This aids in recovery by minimizing movement throughout the night.

Extended computer use or seated desk work causes poor posture, leading to sore shoulders and a stiff neck due to the cervical curve being abnormally straightened. The MajesticPillow comfortably relaxes and maintains the cervical curve while reducing the stress on sore shoulders for a more restful, restorative night’s sleep.

 

Majestic Fusion Topper

1) The counter pressure against shoulder has been eliminated by the Majestic Fusion Topper, providing soothing enveloping comfort around the joint.

2) The spine is now properly supported and aligned from the hips through the shoulders, minimizing the chance of spinal stress and allowing the muscles to relax.

3) Majestic Fusion Topper has eliminated the retail mattress’s painful counter pressure against the hips. The hips are now properly aligned, allowing the hips and lower back muscles to relax,  and the spine is properly supported and aligned.

FORM 

Combines two patented technologies – the cooling, pressure relieving Ergo Gel Layer and the durable, gentle support of the Ergo Transition Layer – with the proprietary, pressure neutralizing Ergo Comfort Layer to create a 3” mattress topper. The patent pending Majestic Fusion Topper works on any surface and immediately molds to any body size and shape and adapts to changes in sleeping position. The Majestic Fusion Topper absorbs more excess body heat all night long compared to all other mattress toppers regardless of price.

FUNCTION

Relieves painful mattress counter-pressure on sensitive joints, minimizing muscle stress and helping promote proper spine alignment.

Provides an economical alternative to purchasing a new mattress while adding unrivaled comfort and support.

For cancer patients on chemotherapy- helps relieve joint pain and absorbs hot flashes and night sweats with its pressure relieving components, heat absorbing cover and Ergo Gel Layer to help the patient sleep cooler and more comfortable. This helps keep them cool and comfortable, affording the rest needed to aid in their recovery.

For fibromyalgia sufferers- helps address sensitivity to pressure and heat to help reduce their pain level. A better night’s sleep helps reduce fatigue, which in turn reduces their sensitivity to pain.

For menopausal women- provides a cooling, pressure-relieving surface that works all night so they can get the rest they need.

Patent Pending Ergo Comfort Mattress 

FORM 

Adapts to your individual body contours for proper spinal support and personalized comfort for a more restful, restorative night’s sleep. The pressure-relieving Ergo Comfort Layer with its cooling mattress cover absorbs excess body heat so you sleep cooler and more comfortably. An edge-to-edge sleep surface independently molds to each person’s body mass and does not telegraph your partner’s motion. Our fast-recovering surface means you can change sleeping positions easily.

Four-way, super-stretch mattress cover with cooling technology combined with the no-flip mattress is hypoallergenic and hinders growth of dust mites and microbial organisms.

The Ergo Comfort Mattress includes a 15-year limited warranty with comfort exchange option.

FUNCTION

Cushioning envelopment surpasses all “bed in a box” mattresses for unrivaled comfort for pressure-sensitive sleepers suffering from arthritis, fibromyalgia, diabetes, circulatory issues, hip and shoulder pain, sundowners from dementia, multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, Parkinson’s disease and lupus.

Stabilizing spinal support helps those suffering from sciatica, scoliosis, disc issues and limited mobility.

Relieves back stress and pain for back and side sleepers.

 

Patent Pending MajesticBed Mattress

FORM

Four comfort layers deliver exceptional pressure-relieving comfort, creating a soothing sleep surface:

Patented Ergo Gel layer absorbs more excess body heat for cooler sleep and conforms to your body, providing more comfort than any other retail sleep surface.

Two Ergo Comfort Layers of liquid gel-infused, second-generation high-density memory foam separated by our patented Ergo Transition Layer provides pressure relief and adaptive spinal support.

The firmness of the high-density Ergo Core Layer creates the stability needed for spinal support for back and side sleepers, as well as the support needed to create the edge-to-edge sleep surface that independently molds to each person’s body mass.

The patent-pending MajesticBed Mattress design relieves pressure-point pain on tender joints and provides unrestricted circulation. It alleviates even the most chronic shoulder and hip pain, while providing adaptive spinal support to relieve back pain. Its fast recovering surface makes it easier to change sleeping position and does not telegraph partner’s motion.

The 4-way stretchable, poly-jacquard fabric cover with cooling technology does not reflect body heat and is allergen resistant. And the no-flip, hypoallergenic, antimicrobial and anti-dust mite mattress is backed by a 15-year warranty and exchange option. 

FUNCTION

Stabilizing spinal support and soothing, pressure-relieving body comfort, especially for chronic hip and shoulder joint pain.

Absorbs more excess body heat to sleep cooler and more comfortable for those suffering from reactions to chemotherapy, hot flashes, menopause or just sleeping too hot.

Cushioning envelopment for unrivaled comfort for pressure-sensitive sleepers suffering from arthritis, fibromyalgia,  diabetes, circulatory issues, hip and shoulder pain, sundowners from dementia, multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, Parkinson’s disease and lupus.

Stabilizing spinal support helps those suffering from sciatica, scoliosis, disc issues and limited mobility.

Relieves back stress and pain for back and side sleepers. 

Risks & Challenges:

Every endeavor may have its risks and challenges, but there aren’t many with MajesticBeds! Our products are market-tested with more than 25 years of incredible results, helping one person at a time find a more supportive, comfortable sleep surface for a truly restful, restorative night’s sleep. MajesticBed sleepers have consistently reported reduced fatigue, reduced pain sensitivities to their medical symptoms and physical issues, and an improved quality of life.

All facets of production and fulfillment are in place in anticipation for our Indiegogo launch. Our domestic manufacturing partners can easily absorb anticipated increases in demand, keeping production time challenges to a minimum. Our production partners and fulfillment systems can produce and ship our MajesticBed pillow, Fusion Mattress Toppers and Majestic Mattress orders in the time frames we set for the Indiegogo.

We use only American manufacturing plants in all facets of our bedding production because we believe and demand the quality that comes from made-in-the-USA products. We support American workers. This also means we are not challenged by delays that can occur with international suppliers.  

We have worked hard over the last 18 months to build up these relationships in preparation for this endeavor and expect to meet all of our delivery deadlines with the launch of this Indiegogo campaign.

And the no-flip, hypoallergenic, antimicrobial and anti-dust mite mattress is backed by a 15-year warranty and exchange option. FUNCTIONStabilizing spinal support and soothing, pressure-relieving body comfort, especially for chronic hip and shoulder joint pain.Absorbs more excess body heat to sleep cooler and more comfortable for those suffering from reactions to chemotherapy, hot flashes, menopause or just sleeping too hot.Cushioning envelopment for unrivaled comfort for pressure-sensitive sleepers suffering from arthritis, fibromyalgia,  diabetes, circulatory issues, hip and shoulder pain, sundowners from dementia, multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, Parkinson’s disease and lupus.Stabilizing spinal support helps those suffering from sciatica, scoliosis, disc issues and limited mobility.Relieves back stress and pain for back and side sleepers. Risks & Challenges:Every endeavor may have its risks and challenges, but there aren’t many with MajesticBeds! Our products are market-tested with more than 25 years of incredible results, helping one person at a time find a more supportive, comfortable sleep surface for a truly restful, restorative night’s sleep. MajesticBed sleepers have consistently reported reduced fatigue, reduced pain sensitivities to their medical symptoms and physical issues, and an improved quality of life.All facets of production and fulfillment are in place in anticipation for our Indiegogo launch. Our domestic manufacturing partners can easily absorb anticipated increases in demand, keeping production time challenges to a minimum. Our production partners and fulfillment systems can produce and ship our MajesticBed pillow, Fusion Mattress Toppers and Majestic Mattress orders in the time frames we set for the Indiegogo.We use only American manufacturing plants in all facets of our bedding production because we believe and demand the quality that comes from made-in-the-USA products. We support American workers. This also means we are not challenged by delays that can occur with international suppliers.  We have worked hard over the last 18 months to build up these relationships in preparation for this endeavor and expect to meet all of our delivery deadlines with the launch of this Indiegogo campaign.

story:
OTEN Medical Wants to Help Fellow Nurses in Crisis

OTEN Medical is a start-up company founded by nurses that work on the floor, in the ICU, and dialysis units. We know what it takes to deliver excellent patient care and be effective.  We saw a need to create a product to organize peripheral IV lines and ventilator tubing for patients admitted to the hospital.  So we created 2 patent-pending products to help keep lines off the floor, reducing risk for infection, and decreasing the risk for accidental dislodgment resulting from pulling or tripping over tangled lines.  We created the iLine to hold general IV lines, feeding tubes, and blood lines. For complex ICU patients on ventilators, we created the iLine Select designed to hold ventilator respiratory tubing on one side and multiple other IV lines on the other.

With this sudden crisis on our hands we realized that our product can help organize lines outside of patient rooms and even organize lines for patients that are on gurneys receiving care in ED departments.  Our healthcare heroes across the nation need more Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) STAT! While our product is not a PPE, it is helping to conserve PPE and limit  exposure.  Our product is being used to secure IV lines outside COVID-19 patient rooms in order to save on PPE and reduce in and out exposure into the room.  

By putting IV infusion pumps just outside of the patient's room:

  • Saves on PPE usage
  • Helps unnecessary staff exposure from patient contact
  • Keeps lines off the floor

 

We NEED your help!

We've been creating these products using our 3D printers in our El Paso, TX facility.  This 3D process takes a long time, and we need your help immediately to donate over 10,000 units to more hospitals.  To print just four iLines and iLine Selects, it takes us 17 hours.  As you can see this is a timely process, and we need to create the tooling necessary to mass produce via injection molding.  This is why it is imperative for you to help us with this task.  

Ernesto Holguin RN has been operating OTEN Medical within the Medical Center of the Americas Accelerator program and is not in a position to finance the project on his own.  With your donation, we are looking to pay for many of the upfront costs.  OTEN Medical is not taking a salary and not looking to profit.  

We are asking for donations in order to cover tooling and manufacturing costs associated with producing these helpful products.  

Our goal is to deliver over 18,000 iLines and 18,000 iLine Selects with $50,000.

Help Make a Difference NOW!

We are hopeful that we are flattening the curve and the practices of shelter in place seem to be working.  However, the need for PPE and maximizing its use still exists.  Check out this video highlighting how nursing staff continues to struggle for more PPE everyday.  

Take Care of Our Healthcare Workers.

While we cannot make the PPE equipment, we can help. We have many hospitals throughout the US that are already impacted.  Many companies are giving masks and PPE.  The CDC standard practice of PPE is such that staff puts it on right before they enter a patients room.  What happens next is to discard the PPE.  However, the demands are so abnormally large for PPE, that the staff has to reuse repeatedly throughout the day.  Even worse, for many days.  Of course they do not want to do this, but they have no choice as there is a mass shortage. Isolation techniques of PPE use has changed due to COVID-19.  Now while other companies are providing masks and PPE, we can help adjust the way we practice by placing the iLines and iLine Selects outside the patient’s door to safely hang IV lines. By doing so, we can help staff manage IV infusion pumps outside the patients room, thus conserving more protective gear and limiting unnecessary exposure into COVID-19 rooms.  This can result in safer patient care and help prevent staff getting sick themselves. 

 
First, we need to meet $12,000 to start manufacturing these products and will order on an ongoing basis to get these products out to your hospitals.  We will provide you with regular updates as products are shipped to the different hospitals. We would like you to choose which hospital you want the products to go to.  This is your donation, so if you are a healthcare worker with COVID-19 patients or you have a loved one with COVID-19, your donations will help the way hospital staff practices patient care tremendously.  
 

We are taking your support by offering two choices:

  1. Gold Backer Package-  $30.00
    • Package  includes a thank you note from OTEN Medical, updates, and a donation in your name for 5 iLines and 5 iLine Selects shipped to the hospital of your choice
  2. Platinum Package-  $100.00 (a $120 value)
    • Package includes a thank you note from OTEN Medical, updates, and a donation in your name for 20 iLines and 20 iLine Selects shipped to the hospital of your choice

Thank you in advance for your generous support.  Together we can help support our healthcare workers to deliver care as safe as possible, so they can remain healthy and take care of our society!

 

More About OTEN Medical

OTEN Medical was founded by registered nurses with over 40 years of combined clinical and medical device experience. Founder Ernesto Holguin, is a registered nurse and a US Army Veteran who has worked with dialysis patients for over 20 years.  The company's vision is to help patients better manage chronic conditions and improve the way healthcare workers deliver their care.  

OTEN Medical is currently working on a patented remote diabetic foot care telehealth system that creates a team approach to help people with diabetes properly care for their feet on a daily basis.  It provides people with diabetes a way to properly assess and care for their feet on an ongoing basis from the comfort of their home.  

To learn more about us visit us at OTENMedical.com

story: In the face of the epidemic, what we need more is self-protection. We need more masks and disinfection, not bullets and guns. I found more masks to meet the needs of everyone's life.

story:
Who We Are

My name is Dave Anderson, and I have been in the technology industry for 22 years, driving marketing, strategy and operations.  My passion is developing technology that solves critical business problems and provides value to customers that helps them save money, and operate more effectively. 

One year ago, I was talking with a colleague who managed data analysis for clinical trials and drug compound research, who was working with several pharmaceutical companies on drug development for diabetes treatment.  I wanted an update on where drug development was headed, as my young son has Type 1 diabetes. 

After multiple discussions, it became apparent there was a critical data management problem.  The amount of “big data”, both structured and unstructured, now available to the health care industry has the potential to allow researchers, analysts, and scientists to be much more effective in how they work and make decisions.  These data sets are so enormous, that it is virtually impossible to securely and efficiently capture, store, share, analyze, correlate and visualize this data with the limited tools and manual processes currently available.  The sheer volume of data that is available that “could” be used in making decisions can easily be multiple terabytes in size. . .a significant and unenviable challenge to manage when a single terabyte could hold 1,000 copies of the Encyclopedia Britannica, and ten terabytes could hold the printed collection of the Library of Congress. 

Working with these massive data sets, and the inability to properly correlate and analyze these disparate data sets, leads to decisions being made with sometimes only 40% of the available data.  If the data can’t be easily and securely captured and correlated, it’s simply not included in the analysis process.  In healthcare, these critical decisions, such as approving a trial to move from phase 1 to phase 2, or approving a drug compound research objective, were being made without all the necessary data, and honestly this scared me. 

Coheezion was created to solve this problem; to be able to comprehensively and securely collect, correlate, and manage the available data that needs to be analyzed, and through new visualization and data modeling capabilities, allow companies to make better, more informed, and more effective decisions.  Decisions that lead directly to enormous cost savings and efficiencies, and new revenue and business opportunities.  

Check us out here!

What We Need

Coheezion’s critical need is $5,000 investment to develop our initial minimum viable product and proof of concept.  We have identified our initial beta customers who will be instrumental in providing feedback and helping to shape the product functionality and user experience, and the investment will go directly to funding the engineering efforts, both resources to code and a few needed technology licenses, that will develop the POC for these beta customers.  One beta customer told me directly, “our visualization and analytic capability currently consists of a few pivot tables and an Access database dashboard.  What you have shown will instrumentally change how we do business.”

The Impact

Imagine one individual, or even at best, a small team, sitting in an office, attempting to manually read, process and analyze multiple data reports which can often be multiple gig’s in size and larger, attempting to correlate in their brain what the data means, how one data set impacts another, and any deep insights that might be hidden in the data.  Now assume that much of this data is unstructured data, and not something that can be easily and quickly manipulated into a readable format.  This reality is what makes data analytics in the health care industry, and really any industry, very difficult and inefficient, which is why much of the data that is really needed to help in decision analytics is simply not included.  There is no easy way to collect, process and analyze much of this data, and the result is that it is simply just ignored. 

Coheezion will add immediate value to any company by being able to comprehensively manage structured and unstructured data together, and use visualizations that are far more sophisticated then pivot tables and basic dashboards, to show relationships and interdependencies between data sets that seem completely unrelated to the naked eye. 

The value in this allows companies to not only use ALL the data that’s available to them in their analysis and decision process, but to do so in a very cost effective and simply way. 

The leaders of Coheezion have successful track records in working closely with customers of all sizes, across multiple industries, to deeply understand their problems and deliver technology solutions that solve these problems and add value. 

Our advisors and team have the world-class expertise in data analytics, decision modeling and creating solutions that companies want and value.  Our passion is on the customer, and delivering what they need to solve their problems.  We’re looking forward to the ride!

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love to have you involved in our project, in any way possible.  Please share our campaign with your friends, family and colleagues, through your favorite social media platform, the Indiegogo share tools, or just by sharing our story with your colleagues over a beer.  We look forward to sharing our journey with you!

Thanks,

Dave

story:
The Powerhouse Protein Way

Think about it...is there any sports nutrition supplement, whether its a pre-workout, protein powder, energy beverage, the list is endless--on the market today that you can say is improving your long term health.  Is there something you feel is effective to maximize the benefits of your workout but at the same time something that you would feel safe taking every day for the rest of your life?

If you answered no, well then you are among the majority of the active population whose goal isn't to be the next Arnold Schwarzenegger but rather just to live a healthy lifestyle.

If you answered yes, then congratulations!  You are probably one of the first to try Powerhouse Protein's Total Fitness Supplement.

If you answered, "I don't care, all I want is my gains" then you are a meathead and shouldn't continue reading.

At Powerhouse Protein, we are the first sports nutrition company with a mission to build a compact line of holistic products that seek to improve both your performance in your gym and your long term health benefits.

Think your premium protein shake with a multivitamin and almost all additives removed along with low carbs, low fat, low cholesterol, no sugar, gluten-free, non-GMO, and only 40 calories that aren't protein all wrapped up in a Vanilla Milkshake flavor so good that 96% of Duke Students thought it was just vanilla milk.

And the best part is?  That's just our proof of concept.


Our Baby


The Total Fitness Supplement is our first product and boy is she beautiful.

Natural: Our 90% whey protein isolate is manufacturer at a cheese factory and is derived directly from their diary products.  Basically, the stuff comes out of the utter, is micro filtered to remove the bad stuff (lactase, excess fat, cholesterol) and instantized to mix perfectly with just a few shakes of your bottle instead of messing with your blender.  That's where every gram of our 8.8g of BCAA's comes from.  Not a chemistry set, not from some questionable source, but a freakin' cheese farm.

Lean: Only 40 calories that are not from protein.  Hello lean-muscle good bye additives

Healthy: Low cholesterol, fat, and 60% of all 12 essential vitamins

Safe: We use no NDI's and source all of our ingredients from large suppliers primarily in the US with COA's and all of our product is manufactured in the US in a c-GMP complaint facility.  That's a bunch of abbreviations to say that we're about as safe as you can get.

Delicious: In a taste test conducted just before the soft launch of our product, 96% of participants couldn't even tell it was a supplement but just thought it was Vanilla Milk

Adaptive: All you have to do is adjust the serving size based on your goals,  and our Total Fitness Supplement will recommend how much and when to take our powder to gear up for success.


LEARN ALL ABOUT OUR TOTAL FITNESS SUPPLEMENT AND THE MANY OTHER BENEFITS AT:

www.powerhouseprotein.com

How Do We Do It?

I would love to tell you we have some crazy magic ritual in the back of our formulating lab that makes everything so healthy and effective.  But that would be way too expensive and probably illegal.

Instead, we take a customer-first approach to formulation:

MOST SPORTS NUTRITION COMPANIES: Start with which ingredients that will maximize their profit and go from there.  That means cram in ingredients that are in demand and that provide the most immediate results and cut back on everything else.

MORE "GREEN" SPORTS NUTRITION COMPANIES: These are the companies you would find on the shelves at your natural food pavilions.  They are concerned with providing the most safe and healthy supplement so they often turn to soy or plant derivatives.  While these are excellent for your health, they are often not effective in reaping the most benefits because solely plant-based substances lack complete amino acids profiles.  And those are the little guys that are essential in lean muscle growth.

POWERHOUSE:  I'm not a numbers guy I'm a people guy so we don't start with all of the boring details of balancing ingredients and budgets.  Instead we go around and ask people like you, people who want a supplement that matches their lifestyle, not just their time in the gym and ask them their main "worry factors" in regards to both the long term and short term effectiveness of the supplement.  And then we address them using only the highest quality ingredients.



Why We Need You!

The Total Fitness Supplement is awesome, so we want to put it in awesome hands like yours.  However, it is just our first product.  We have another flavor and another supplement already formulated and waiting to revolutionize the sports nutrition industry.  I have personally bootstrapped this project the entire way through but I need your help to bring everything to an even broader market.

I encourage you to try our product because, frankly, its a win-win for you; you get a supplement that will improve your health and fitness unique from any other AND you help us help others like you achieve their health goals.


The Story of The Scrawny Football Player

The Founding of Powerhouse Protein

My freshman year of high school, I was playing 3 positions on the football team and weighed under 95 pounds.  My coach naturally told me that, to have any chance at making varsity, I would have to put on some serious weight and recommended several supplements.  While they were proven to be effective in the short run, I was hesitant to take anything I wouldn't feel safe putting in my body every day for the rest of my life.  

Through quite a crazy series of events I was put in touch with the head chemist at a very large supplement company and told him my dilemma: the need for a supplement that would maximize my results in the gym but also not work against my long-term health but rather improve it.  He offered me a job working for no pay in exchange for 1 hour of his time in the lab after work every day to learn everything he could about supplement formulation.

And so I quit my job, ironically quit football, and that was the beginning of Powerhouse Protein.

Now with the incredible resources at Duke, I have the ability to turn Powerhouse Protein from a personal project to a vision of a healthier Sports Nutrition market that I can only make happen with your love.

Every dollar, share, or mention of Powerhouse Protein brings me one step closer to this dream coming true and, most importantly, brings all of us one step closer to healthier, active living

that makes everything so healthy and effective.  But that would be way too expensive and probably illegal.Instead, we take a customer-first approach to formulation:MOST SPORTS NUTRITION COMPANIES: Start with which ingredients that will maximize their profit and go from there.  That means cram in ingredients that are in demand and that provide the most immediate results and cut back on everything else.MORE "GREEN" SPORTS NUTRITION COMPANIES: These are the companies you would find on the shelves at your natural food pavilions.  They are concerned with providing the most safe and healthy supplement so they often turn to soy or plant derivatives.  While these are excellent for your health, they are often not effective in reaping the most benefits because solely plant-based substances lack complete amino acids profiles.  And those are the little guys that are essential in lean muscle growth.POWERHOUSE:  I'm not a numbers guy I'm a people guy so we don't start with all of the boring details of balancing ingredients and budgets.  Instead we go around and ask people like you, people who want a supplement that matches their lifestyle, not just their time in the gym and ask them their main "worry factors" in regards to both the long term and short term effectiveness of the supplement.  And then we address them using only the highest quality ingredients.Why We Need You!The Total Fitness Supplement is awesome, so we want to put it in awesome hands like yours.  However, it is just our first product.  We have another flavor and another supplement already formulated and waiting to revolutionize the sports nutrition industry.  I have personally bootstrapped this project the entire way through but I need your help to bring everything to an even broader market.I encourage you to try our product because, frankly, its a win-win for you; you get a supplement that will improve your health and fitness unique from any other AND you help us help others like you achieve their health goals.The Story of The Scrawny Football Player
The Founding of Powerhouse ProteinMy freshman year of high school, I was playing 3 positions on the football team and weighed under 95 pounds.  My coach naturally told me that, to have any chance at making varsity, I would have to put on some serious weight and recommended several supplements.  While they were proven to be effective in the short run, I was hesitant to take anything I wouldn't feel safe putting in my body every day for the rest of my life.  Through quite a crazy series of events I was put in touch with the head chemist at a very large supplement company and told him my dilemma: the need for a supplement that would maximize my results in the gym but also not work against my long-term health but rather improve it.  He offered me a job working for no pay in exchange for 1 hour of his time in the lab after work every day to learn everything he could about supplement formulation.And so I quit my job, ironically quit football, and that was the beginning of Powerhouse Protein.Now with the incredible resources at Duke, I have the ability to turn Powerhouse Protein from a personal project to a vision of a healthier Sports Nutrition market that I can only make happen with your love.Every dollar, share, or mention of Powerhouse Protein brings me one step closer to this dream coming true and, most importantly, brings all of us one step closer to healthier, active living

story:
At Vulcan, we have a bright vision for the future - to change the world's perspective on amputees and people with disabilities.

 

We develop prosthetics aimed to serve lower to middle-income amputees in developing countries through specific modules that can be attached to their daily-used prosthetic arm. To take a step further, we created UpLift.

 

UPLIFT:

Uplift is a mission to put at least 10% of the amputee population in developing countries newly or back to the workforce by 2025 through the synergy between technology innovation, human empowerment and sustainable business practices. 

 

We'll use this Indiegogo campaign to fund the putting of prosthetics onto 30 beneficiaries. That’s 30 lives changed, 30 products out there, and 30 people who will be driving the future development of human augmenting technology. For us, this means we can help the first generation of users get out there and earning independent income with the job-oriented attachments.

 

 

As we believe in meaningful products, we created a range of rewards linked to both our philosophy and design process. Our backers will each get something representing part of who we are and what we do, and those who sponsor a whole arm will also get a plaque listing them as a foundation backer, and a quote of their choice on a matching plate on the arm they sponsored. 

3D printed miniature robotic arm for our backers

 

OUR APPROACH:

There are two parts to making Uplift a reality. Firstly, the product. The first job-specific module that Vulcan is developing in relation to the Uplift project is the Waiter module, specially-tailored for every waitressing task.

Waiter modules that can be 'plug & play' - instantly adapted to job

Secondly, the partners. We work with NGOs and organizations that have connections and influence over the PWD community to help us raise awareness about the job opportunities, to empower amputees to join the force as well as to connect the project’s beneficiaries with other possible resources and support.

 

At its most basic level, this campaign will fundamentally change 30 lives and get them back on the road to support themselves and their families. Our Impact Proposition can be simplified into 3 Main Points;

 

EMPOWERMENT:

Uplift fosters independence and empowerment through giving amputees the ability to not only function but to excel at what they do. They are also making a statement by using our prosthetics in full view of the public.

 

LIFE-LONG VALUE:

Amputations don’t go away. We expect to be a life-long partner with our users, growing and sharing everything with them. Their success is our success.

 

SOCIAL AWARENESS:

Uplift aims to change how society sees amputees, but more importantly, how amputees see themselves - not as broken; but full of potential. It's about time society changed their perspective on the disabled.

 

WHAT NEXT?


We are not asking for money to build a product. We are asking for help to get the product we already have onto the first generation of users and to show that the next evolution of man/machine technology can be accessible to everyone.

 

The existing products and designs just aren’t working. Many prosthetics on the market only has a few functions, if not only one. Yet they're expensive, hard to use, difficult to access, and don’t help people do what they really need: Supporting themselves and their families.

 

 

 

Robotic arms that make amputees independent not only physically, mentally, but also financially

 

 

 

 

Our prosthetics look however you want them to look. Want to cosplay Deus Ex? Can do. If you fancy something more reserved, skin covers are available. Want your own specific colour or pattern? Go online and get a quote.

The full potential of this component is only possible with your help. By contributing to Uplift, it allows us to experiment more and enter new markets and industries by creating more unique and task-specific grips.

The limit is our creativity.

 

 

 

 

"I saw other groups attempting to solve the same problem and felt that the technology had so much potential that was not being used efficiently and effectively with the end USER in mind. That is why I founded Vulcan Augmetics, to make technology work for people, and to help people get the most out of that technology."

– Rafael Masters (Co-founder & CEO)

"South East Asia has abundant but underutilized resources which makes it a perfect place to create new product breakthroughs. However, the masses still suffer from the lack of advanced solutions in the fields of prosthetic. At Vulcan, we strive to bridge this very Gap between innovation, resources and needs."

– Akshay Sharma (Co-founder & CTO)

 

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES:

The biggest risks are scaling up manufacturing and medical licensing. We will be looking to make small batches to start, however, we can also manufacture on a unit-by-unit basis if necessary which should alleviate some of the risks.

We will not be applying for FDA or CE licensing yet. We will be starting in Vietnam and moving to the other South East Asian nations after. We are already in the process of our license application and our ISO 9001 certification - which should be completed within 3 months.

Meanwhile, our first group of users will be signing disclaimers and we will be giving them a free warranty until we have implemented their feedback into the next (wider scale) generation of hand. 

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP:

There are all kinds of ways you can help if this is a project you are interested in. There are all the conventional things, such as liking our FB page, commenting or sharing posts, and most importantly sharing THIS campaign, but there are also a few other ways you can push this project forward.

We are always looking for new module designs or concepts that could improve what we do, so if you have an idea - don't be afraid to share it with us too. Put up a sketch on your social media and tag "Vulcan Augmetics" and we will take a look. We are really excited to see what the design community can come up with will be contacting anyone who has a great design concept for the next generation, so show us what you want the future to look like!

You can also share this campaign on social media! We are on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and even Instagram! Like our page and leave a comment or two if you have any questions.

If you know anyone who is an amputee or amputee organizations, hook us up. We would love to talk to them and get feedback.

 

We thank you again for your support!

story:
Help Shave a Head and Save Some Lives

Hello friends, family, colleagues, esteemed business persons and multibillionaire philanthropists! My name is Joey Saffren and I am a college student at Texas State University. For this little project, I will be doing something that I have never done in my entire life: I will be shaving my head. Now to most people, shaving your head isn't very big of a deal, but what you need to understand is that I have never been bald. I was one of those lucky people born with a full head of hair. One sexy baby indeed! But this isn't about me and my amazing head of baby hair, this is about something more serious. Cancer has been a prevalent issue in my family, so the idea of losing someone or have someone suffer from cancer has always concerned me.

I've always wanted to do something to help, but never had a good idea on what to do. Then I heard about people who get sponsored to shave their heads. I thought that was a perfect idea and knew that that is what I wanted to do. Even though I don't have enough hair to donate it, I can still be supportive by shaving my head and donating my sponsors money to research.

Why MD Anderson

I chose to donate the money to MD Anderson Cancer Center because as of right now, they are ranked as the number one cancer center in the United States by U.S. News. Their facilities are ranked the highest in every category from how many nurses and doctors they hold on staff to how many patients they discharge successfully. With this money "MD Anderson Cancer Center will make a difference in the lives of cancer patients now and in the future by supporting innovative cancer patient care, research, education and prevention programs at one of the world's most outstanding comprehensive cancer centers." 

 

Why Should You Donate?

People often don't donate to charities or organizations because they don't want to have to give a big sum of money and they don't feel small sums will be appreciated. Well here is your chance then! Even if you can only spare a dollar, with enough people that will soon equal hundreds. It doesn't matter how much you donate. As long as you are able to spare even the smallest amounts, you will make a difference and you will change someone's life. 

But I know what your thinking, "If I'm spending this money, I want something in return!" Well this is your chance to get prizes in return for donating! Now you have to understand, I'm a poor college student, so the prizes are going to be things I am able to do without spending money. But I've come up with some pretty creative things, so hopefully you can find something worth donating for! :)

 

Question or Concerns??

If you have any question, comments, concern or just want to get in contact with me somehow, please email me at ShaveJoey@gmail.com!

Thank you all so much and happy donating! :)

story:
Some of you may know my sister or her husband. 

About five years ago, they began to try to have children and raise a family.  They couldn’t get pregnant and, after two years, began seeing doctors.  They went to numerous doctors and specialists, had tests run on both of them, and tried different medications and therapy.  Everything was to no avail.  As any of you who have had a medical condition requiring lots of doctor appointments and tests can verify, it can be very expensive. Very few insurance companies, including theirs, cover these kinds of tests. 

In April, they went to yet another fertility specialist in Montana. With all of the anatomy and physiology involved, there are numerous things that can affect the ability to conceive naturally.  As the medical system goes, each test is for a part of the reproductive system.  If a part is working, but at a less than normal level, it can effect the chances of getting pregnant without being a definitive cause for not being able to. 

The doctorcan’t say what the problem is exactly, but she feels that Melissa will not get pregnant without the use of Invetro Fertilization.  This can be a very expensive procedure.  Invetro is a process where the doctor surgically goes into the woman and removes all her eggs.  Then the doctor takes the eggs and fertilizes the eggs with the man’s sperm outside of the woman’s body.  Once an embryo forms, it is placed back into the female’s body to continue developing into a baby. 

Wanting to be parents, they are also moving forward to foster/adopt.  They have taken classes to become licensed to be foster or adoptive parents.  Adoption can also be a long and expensive process.  Private adoption companies charge for their services and the couple is expected to pay before there is any assurance the adoption will go through.  Also, travel expenses can add up quickly. 

I would like your help with a Christmas present like no other.  I am trying to help them fulfill their dream of becoming parents.  I’m asking  for you to consider donating whatever you feel you and your family can financially give in order to help them achieve their dream of becoming parents.  Whatever amount you feel led to give will be a blessing to them.  If you cannot donate, they completely understand. 

I am also asking anyone out there that if you know someone who is looking for good adoptive parents for a child, please keep them in mind. 

Lastly, I ask that you post this on your Facebook wall and share it with your family and friends.  Perhaps, if you are not in a position to help them otherwise, one of your family members or friends will be able to.

Thank you for reading their story, sharing, and supporting in any way that you can.  Thank you from the bottom of our hearts and God bless.

story:
Hi,

     My name is Marina and I am a rhythmic gymnastics coach, fashion designer, personal trainer, model and dancer. I competed as a rhythmic gymnast for 6 years and was top in the nation before I got injured at the age of 13. My injury led to the development of avascular nicrosis of my left hip. It was probably one of the most heartbreaking moments in my life when the doctors told me that I would not be able to walk normally ever again, let alone dance or compete. They were convinced that my leg would never grow to its full length, and they said I would need hip replacement because there is no other solution. I have been doing everything in my power to prove them wrong.

My path has been in the direction of homeopathic medication and constant exercise which has helped me keep my leg as healthy as possible. After extensive research of new treatments and procedures, I have thankfully found an alternative to hip replacement and have been accepted as a candidate in a stem cell treatment by Regenexx.

 

(Left: Training 2004 | Right: Modeling 2013)

 

My love for this sport has allowed me to continue on with it in the only other way possible which is coaching. It is the most rewarding thing to be able to pass my knowledge to my students and be there to support them.

 

 

(Just some of my students)


In this Regenexx procedure the doctor takes your stem cells and injects them into the affected area so that the the "self healing" process can begin. In my case I will have an injection directly into my hip bone.

The procedure is about $6500 but any contribution would help tremendously.

 

(Competing)

 

I work out on a daily basis to keep my leg mobile and strong, but due to the avascular nicrosis my bone has been collapsing. I have severe arthritis in my hip along with cysts and bone spurs, and have begun to develop Scoliosis in my back. With all this comes a great deal of pain and frustration. I have good days and bad days but the last time I was pain free was about 9 years ago before my injury.

I feel that I am getting a second chance and I am so excited and grateful to be able to undergo this procedure! I can't wait to be able to live my life without constant pain from the simple things such as walking, standing, sitting, and yes even sleeping. I can only hope that this procedure will also allow me to once again enjoy dancing, excercising and other physical activites pain free.

 

(Left: My Last Competition 2004 | Right: Summer 2012 )


The video of me you see at the top is from 2009. This was the last time I was able to perform. Up to that point, I was able to fight through the pain and agony, but finally it all just became too much. My dream is really to have the ability to perform again, and this procedure is my only hope of being able to do so.


Normally I am not one to ask for handouts, but honestly I can not think of any other way to afford this. Regenexx procedures are not covered by any health insurance companies.  Even if you cannot help with a monetary contribtuion, just sharing this page and my story with your friends, family and colleagues would mean the world to me. Thank you so much!

story:
Hi my name is Kristy Lockhart and my best friend has been diagnosed with Lyme Disease. It wasnt until this past year that finally she recieved a proper diagnosis after years of being told a different story every time in a medical visit.
I wish to do everything I can to help her. This is a desperate plea to everybody to please help me financially get her back to the U.S.A for another round of treatment.
In Canada proper testing and treatment are not available. The majority of people with Lyme disease are misdiagnosed for years and by the time it is discovered it is almost too late.
The very first visit to the USA that day cost me $1500. Thanks to YOU and your generous donations I was able to provide this for Heather. Monthly treatment (not including her antibiotics) suggested from the lyme doctor is hundreds of dollars on potent specialized probiotics that have to be special ordered, certain vitamins and minerals, supplements as well as a very strict NO yeast/gluten/wheat/yeast/sugar diet. Everyday she has to also juice a variety of greens so her body can absorb the nutrients properly. One teaspoon of sugar/honey/sweetner/etc can suppress Heather's immune system for 6 hours. Also she recieves monthly treatment as well from a wonderful Lyme literate Naturopath.

4 years ago she had a gym membership, walked 5 miles a day, hiked, spent time in nature, and constantly doing photo shoots. Now, she can't walk more than 20 minutes, becomes so fatigued far too quickly, has difficulty breathing, chest pains, migraines, her joints swell up so bad she can't write or type, difficulty folding laundry, doing dishes and playing with her cat. Something in her body is malfunctioning as her entire body is covered in edema and this past year she had to go on heart medication as this disease is affecting her heart now.

This woman means everything to me.  I can't put into words how much I love her. She is an amazing artist/photographer (www.redbubble.com/people/locustgirl) and a genuine pure soul and there's nothing I won't do for her. Meeting someone like this only happens once in a lifetime, and I fear her lifetime will be over soon if her medical treatment is unable to continue.

Donating to this compaign will ensure proper medical care and treatment and lodging while undergoing this care. It doesn't matter if it's $1 or $1000 every little bit helps. Even if you have no $ to donate, please will you post this on various social networking tools to spread the word?

Even while ill, both she and I helped out with other fundraisers (Rideau Valley Wildlife Sanctuary) by donating hundreds of dollars worth of her art to be sold to help treat injured wildlife. She went to college to learn how to take care of the disabled, now she is disabled.

She left home at 15 and she has no blood relatives who can help her, and she hasn't worked for the last 3 years due to being so ill. I am a single woman and the ONLY person who has been helping her for years, please can you help me help her?
There is a serious gap in Canada for testing and treatment of this horrible disease. Recently Elizabeth May (MP) introduced a new bill into parliament detailing how this disease should be dealt with.  Bill C-442 is the name of this bill and on May's website the petition to gather support to get this passed into law is available. Lets band together on this and get the treatment/education here in Canada!! This is good for the future, but my friend needs help IMMEDIATELY.
My best friend, Heather, has seen 50 doctors in the last 4 years (including 3 neurosurgeons, infectious disease doctors, rheumetologists, dermotologists, neurologists) which she was left with no definitive answers as to the root cause of all her symptoms, until now. Lyme disease, if not detected in the early stages becomes chronic lyme and ends up attacking the heart, kidneys and liver.

We are givers and this is very hard to ask for help. To prove this, for certain denominations I will print and mail to you your choices from Heather's photography gallery. If you love wildlife and nature or creative works combining the beautiful female form with nature, you are sure to love Heather King's artwork. Side note: there are some pieces on her site which have a filter on them. Please know that nothing was done for shock value. Heather did darker work in her past as a release from brutal physical and sexual abuse.
Please do not place an order through RedBubble as you will be charged for the prints and you have already generously donated to this campaign. Please use Redbubble as a gallery and email me directly what prints you would like.  Any questions or for a list of the prints you would like, please email me here lockhart_ottawa@hotmail.com


I promise you if you were to meet Heather you would love her almost as much as I do.  I have never met another soul with such an enormous loving heart as hers.
Please helps us
love
Kristy

story:
Long story short... 

Emil is an everyday 28 years old male from Sofia, Bulgaria. He loves climbing, football and travelling and he enjoys the company of his loving wife and family. He is just a person, like you and me... 

In October 2012 Emil was diagnosed with testicular cancer. About a month later he had an operation to remove the entity in which was detected the presence of a malignant tumor of mixed type -  seminoma and embryonal carcinoma. For the ones who don't know, embryonal carcinoma is a very aggressive type of tumor that usually develops in young men. After the tests we started realizing how serious Emil's situation actually is...


The treatment started with the first appointment of two courses of chemotherapy. Luckily the cancer was detected in its early stage and at the time the doctors were confident that the treatment will have an effect and eventually destroy the carcinomas. We really thought that this might be it but unfortunately only three months after the treatment, in March 2013, after control examination the doctors told us that Emil's tumor markers and MRI have increased and the cancer had spread to the lymph nodes. It wasn't pleasant experience but we had to accept the facts and start treatment again. 


The doctors administered new four course chemotherapy and this time they recommended the strongest medication for this type of disease. In early July, the therapy was completed after 4 courses. Emil lost weight, hair and became pale. He certainly did not enjoy the treatment but did not complain either.


In the next four months all went well as there were no signs of development and Emil started recovering. Even in November 2013 the PET scanner examinations were positive confirming that the cancer is not spreading. We were really happy thinking that Emil had beaten cancer and we were all going to close this dark chapter of our lives.


Emil started getting back to normal life of caring husband and honest tax payer. Everything was going well until he went for a control NMRI that found new metastasis. The results were devastating! The oncologists administered radical lymph nodes extraction. The operation was conducted on 25.02.2014. We knew how serious the situations is but we were hoping that his might be the end, we thought this could be the turning point were the problem will be over. However we were wrong, it turned out that the real fight was about to begin...


Since then we've met with various doctors from Bulgaria and they said that they can't do much but they advised us to start looking for treatment abroad. So we did! After couple months of research we got in touch with oncologists from Israel who confirmed that they will be able to help. Emil went for examination to Tel Aviv and the doctors confirmed that his type of cancer is treatable! They confirmed that high dose chemo with peripheral stem cell implant will not only help Emil live longer but it actually might cure him!

The only problem is that the good things come with a price tax. The treatment has a fixed price impossible for Emil to afford - 110,000 EUR. Such sum might be considered a good news in Western Europe or USA but it certainly isn't' in Bulgaria. Even though that Emil's case was covered on national TV in Bulgaria, we still have less than 10% of the sum required. The treatment is required ASAP and will begin as soon as funds are available. The doctors told that we can wait up to three months. 


Please support us in our fight to help a young man return back to his normal life!

Please donate and spread the word by sharing our Facebook page

story:
Short Summary

The Community Soccer indoor soccer building is nearing completion, but we need your help to complete the final phase of construction.  This building is located in an area that will provide soccer opportunities for many underserved youth.

We are seeking $21,000 to complete the walls surrounding the field, turf installation, netting, and illuminated field boundaries so that teams will have the option to play off-the-wall or with out-of-bounds.  Any amount over $21,000 will go towards constructing a spectator deck and enhancing the building to ensure a quality indoor soccer environment.  A significant amount over our goal will go towards constructing another field.  We want this space to be a welcoming home for soccer players.  Your help will kick-start a new era for indoor soccer in the Black Hills area.

What You Get

Level 1 ($10) - Your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible!

Level 2 ($25) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle and your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible!

Level 3 ($50) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle and an invitation to participate in a Level 3 contributors group soccer lesson on the new indoor soccer field and your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible! Or, if you cannot participate in a group soccer lesson, you will receive a Community Soccer sport towel.

Level 4 ($100) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle and one free private individual or team soccer training session conducted by Community Soccer Founder and former W-League player Fabiana Meredith. Also, your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible! OR, if you prefer not to receive a private training session, you will receive a Community Soccer lunch bag.

Level 5 ($250) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle plus an exclusive invitation to participate in a private kick-around with other Level 5 contributors on the new indoor soccer field. Also, your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible!. OR, if you cannot participate in a private kick-around, you will receive a Community Soccer duffle bag.

Level 6 ($500) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle, one free private individual or team soccer training session conducted by Community Soccer Founder and former W-League player Fabiana Meredith, and your own private party kick-around on the new indoor soccer field. Also, your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible! OR, you may choose to receive a Community Soccer water bottle, lunch bag and duffle bag instead.

Level 7 ($1,000) – You will receive a Community Soccer water bottle, your own private party kick-around on the new indoor soccer field, and a private helicopter ride for you and a guest to see Mt. Rushmore. Also, your name will be included in a display inside the building as part of the people that made this possible! OR instead, you may choose to receive a limited edition, personalized Community Soccer jersey and soccer ball.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    1. Pass along our Indiegogo Crowdfunding link to others you know who may be interested in contributing.

    2. Contact Us if you are able to contribute building materials.

    3. Contact Us if you are able to offer an extra hand during the final construction stages.  


    www.CommunitySoccer.us

story:
KGWans Hot Sauce


KGWans is an artisan hot sauce made up of local and organic ingredients. Each small batch of KGWans is made by hand in batches less than 125 bottles.

The Flavors (When buying, use comment section to specify which flavor!)

Double F - Sweet Chili (Medium)

Triple F - Sweet Habanero (Hot)

Druple F - Habanero Fire (Very Hot)


Who are we?

We are a group of five aspiring entrepreneurs in a program called Venture For America, a two-year fellowship that mobilizes recent graduates as entrepreneurs to revitalize cities on the rise.  We believe in creating opportunity, supporting local businesses, and growing entrepreneurial communities.  We are in a weeklong competition to create an IndieGoGo campaign to raise money for a product we believe in.  We have partnered with KGWans Hot Sauce and local Santa Cruz entrepreneur, Karl Goldfield, to help grow the business around his amazing product.

Why KGWans Hot Sauce?

A simple taste of this special, delicious hot sauce says everything and more about the product. Almost as impactful as the taste is the story of how KGWans came into existence. Karl Goldfield first created the organic hot sauce to complement the food he served at his barbecue parties in Santa Cruz, California. After receiving rave reviews of his special sauce, he began bottling it. After giving away thousands of bottles for free to friends and family, Karl began to realize that he may have something special.  Help us learn our skills as aspiring entrepreneurs as we have the chance to improve business sales, support a local entrepreneur using organic ingredients, and most importantly, try some fantastic hot sauce that has people talking from Santa Cruz all the way to Providence, Rhode Island.

What KGWans needs

- One new bottler  http://www.handyfiller.com/Welcome.html

- Two new vitamixes https://www.vitamix.com/shop/7500.aspx

- 10,000 labels https://www.lightninglabels.com/llcheckout/Onli...


Whether you have received one or two free bottles of hot sauce from one of Karl’s famous barbecues, or if you are interested in supporting and trying a unique and delicious hot sauce, please support us and Karl as we Venture For America
